title: Executive Assistant UK Hours
description:
Executive Assistant (Full-Time)



Overview

We are seeking a highly organised, proactive, and trustworthy Executive Assistant to support operations across multiple business ventures and personal responsibilities. This role requires an individual who can manage diverse tasks independently, maintain high standards, and contribute meaningful structure and efficiency across all areas of work and life.



The Executive Assistant will operate across four core departments:



Amazon Mentoring Business – Social media content creation, post scheduling via 
, and general operational support.



African Logistics & Agriculture Business – Market research, coordination tasks, and administrative support.



Recruitment Business – Process management, candidate coordination, and research.



Personal Administration – Managing payments, organising schedules, and implementing systems that maintain structure and productivity.



Key Responsibilities



Create, schedule, and manage social media content across platforms using 
.



Conduct research and compile clear reports for logistics, agriculture, and recruitment initiatives.



Support recruitment workflows, including communication and coordination.



Manage personal administrative tasks such as bill payments, scheduling, reminders, and general life organisation.



Make professional outbound calls when required; a confident and clear telephone manner is essential.



Receive daily task lists each morning and complete work independently without constant supervision.



Implement systems that improve efficiency, organisation, and communication across all departments.



Candidate Requirements



Proven experience as an Executive Assistant, Operations Assistant, Project Coordinator, or similar role.



Demonstrated experience managing people, tasks, or projects across multiple priorities.



Strong organisational skills and ability to work independently with minimal oversight.



Professional communication skills, including a strong telephone presence.



High level of discretion, reliability, and professionalism.



Comfortable using productivity tools, scheduling platforms, and research workflows.



Ability to take ownership of tasks and deliver outcomes without requiring repeated review.



Working Style Expectations

This role is designed to reduce workload and increase operational efficiency. The successful candidate must be self-directed, detail-oriented, and capable of executing tasks to a high standard. Consistent failure to meet expectations or requiring excessive supervision will not be suitable for this position.



Compensation & Benefits



Competitive salary (discussed during interview process)



Full-time position with immediate start



Employee benefits package including healthcare and performance-based bonuses



Bonus structure and additional benefits activated from the 6-month mark



Selection Process

Shortlisted candidates will be given three identical practical tasks to complete under timed conditions. Performance, quality of execution, and ability to follow instructions will determine the final hiring decision.



Ideal Candidate

A dependable, professional operator who can be trusted with both business and personal responsibilities, adds structure rather than complexity, and contributes to the long-term growth of multiple ventures.

title: Social Media Content Creator (Short-Form Video)
description:
SOCIAL MEDIA CONTENT CREATOR - SHORT-FORM VIDEO

Bitcoin Trading Setup App | TikTok Focus | $
/month



 $
/month + BONUSES | Long-term role | Growth opportunity





- THE PRODUCT



Bitcoin trading setup app launching March 2026.



Sends systematic setup notifications to traders when technical 

confirmations align. Helps traders execute without emotions.



You'll get full access to the app so you understand what 

you're marketing.



________________________________________________________________________________________________________



- YOUR ROLE



Create 25-35 short-form videos per week.



PRIMARY PLATFORM: TikTok (90% of focus)

SECONDARY: Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts (same videos, cross-posted)



Research what's going viral in Bitcoin/trading/finance TikTok, 

then create content using our app assets.



You'll have creative freedom. We provide app screenshots, 

brand guidelines, and app access. You bring the viral execution.



________________________________________________________________________________________________________



-  RESPONSIBILITIES



- Research viral formats in Bitcoin/trading/finance (primarily TikTok)

- Create 25-35 short videos per week (8-15 seconds, vertical)

- Edit with text overlays, trending music, transitions

- Optimize for TikTok algorithm (primary platform)

- Cross-post to Instagram Reels and YouTube Shorts

- Upload finished videos to shared Google Drive

- Weekly 15-min check-in: what's working, what to try next

- Suggest new content ideas based on trends

- Stay responsive (reply to messages within 24 hours)



90% of your focus will be TikTok. The same videos get posted 

to Instagram and YouTube for maximum reach.



You'll work independently. We give weekly direction, you execute.



________________________________________________________________________________________________________



- WHAT WE PROVIDE



- Full access to the app (so you understand the product)

- Brand guidelines (colors, fonts, tone)

- Weekly strategic feedback

- Examples of successful formats to reference



________________________________________________________________________________________________________



- REQUIREMENTS



MUST HAVE:

- Short-form video portfolio with 100K+ total views (REQUIRED)

  - TikTok, Instagram Reels, or YouTube Shorts

- Strong understanding of TikTok algorithm and trends

- Experience creating viral content

- Fluent English for text overlays and communication

- Video editing skills (CapCut, Premiere, Final Cut, etc.)

- Work independently without constant supervision

- Reliable communication (respond within 24 hours)

- Fast internet and reliable computer



NICE TO HAVE (not required):

- Finance/crypto/trading content experience

- Multi-platform posting experience

- AI voiceover tools knowledge



Your portfolio should show viral short-form content with 

100K+ total views across your work.



________________________________________________________________________________________________________



-  DELIVERABLES & PERFORMANCE



FULL-TIME ROLE (40 hours/week):



MINIMUM EXPECTATION: 25 videos/week

- Baseline requirement to stay in the role



TARGET RANGE: 30-35 videos/week

- This is where we expect you to be in steady state

- Shows efficient, consistent work



EXCEPTIONAL PERFORMANCE: 40+ videos/week

- Only if quality remains high (we review weekly)

- Eligible for overdelivery bonuses



QUALITY OVER QUANTITY:

- All videos must be unique (no template spam)

- Research-backed (adapting proven viral formats)

- On-brand (matches tone and guidelines)

- Ready to publish (no additional edits needed)



We'd rather have 25 great videos than 50 rushed ones.



COMMUNICATION:

- Reply to messages within 24 hours

- Weekly 15-minute check-in call (Friday)

- Be proactive about flagging issues or asking questions



________________________________________________________________________________________________________



- COMPENSATION



BASE RATE: $
/month

- Based on experience and portfolio quality

- For consistent delivery of 25-35 videos/week



OVERDELIVERY BONUS:

- 35-40 videos/week: +$50/month*

- 40+ videos/week: +$100/month*

*Only if quality remains high (reviewed)



VIRAL PERFORMANCE BONUS:

- 100K+ views: $25 per video

- 500K+ views: $50 per video

- 1M+ views: $100 per video



PAYMENT SCHEDULE:

- Monthly 



Top performers can earn $700-1,000+/month with bonuses. Sky is the limit with the bonuses.



________________________________________________________________________________________________________



-  WORKING HOURS



OUTPUT-BASED ROLE (not hourly).



We don't track hours. We track results.



FULL-TIME COMMITMENT:

- Deliver 25-35 videos per week minimum

- Available for 15-min check-in

- Respond to messages

- Typically takes 30-40 hours/week



FLEXIBLE SCHEDULE:

- Work whenever you want (morning, night, weekends)

- No fixed hours required

- No time tracking

- Just deliver the weekly output and stay responsive



Some weeks you might work 6 hours/day, others 10 hours/day.

As long as videos are delivered and you're reachable, we're good.



________________________________________________________________________________________________________



- OUR CULTURE



This is a startup. We work hard and move fast.



You'll have autonomy and creative freedom, but we expect:

- Consistent delivery (hit weekly targets, no excuses)

- Initiative (suggest ideas, don't wait to be told)

- High standards (quality over quantity, always)

- Reliability (stay responsive, no ghosting)

- Ownership (treat this like your project, not just a job)



In return, you get:

- Real growth opportunities (content ? strategy ? leadership)

- Performance bonuses (rewarded for results)

- Equity potential (exceptional long-term performers)

- Work freedom (work whenever, just deliver)

- Product access (use the app, understand what you're building)



If you want to coast, this isn't the role.

If you want to build something real, apply.



________________________________________________________________________________________________________



- GROWTH PATH



Start: Content creation



Grow into: Strategy, app store creative, product feedback, 

marketing leadership



If you perform well and show initiative, this role can expand 

beyond just content creation.



We're building a company, not just hiring a contractor.



________________________________________________________________________________________________________



- HOW TO APPLY



Include ALL of these in your application:



1. PORTFOLIO LINK (REQUIRED)

   - TikTok, Instagram Reels, or YouTube Shorts you've created

   - Must show 100K+ total views across your work



2. ANSWER THIS QUESTION:

   - "What makes a TikTok go viral in the finance/trading niche?"

   - Write 2-3 sentences



3. YOUR AVAILABILITY:

    - Confirm you can work full-time (25-35 videos/week)

   -  Confirm you can respond to messages within 24 hours



4. RATE EXPECTATION:

   - What's your expected monthly rate?



5. WORK SAMPLE (optional but highly preferred):

   - Create 1 sample TikTok about systematic vs emotional trading

   - Show us your creative approach (even without our assets)

   - This moves you to the top of the list



________________________________________________________________________________________________________



- WHO WE'RE LOOKING FOR



ONE person who:



- Takes initiative (suggests ideas, doesn't wait to be told)

- Thinks strategically (understands WHY content works)

- Stays current (knows what's trending this week)

- Executes consistently (delivers quality on deadline)

- Communicates reliably (responsive, easy to reach)

- Wants to build (not just looking for quick cash)



We're NOT looking for:

- People who need constant direction

- Template executors with no creativity

- Anyone who ghosts or misses deadlines

- People who disappear for days without communication

- People chasing easy money



________________________________________________________________________________________________________



Strong candidates who apply early and deliver quality work 

in the test will get hired faster.



________________________________________________________________________________________________________



- WHY JOIN US?



- Ground floor opportunity (employee #1 for content)

- Creative freedom (we trust your expertise)

- Growth path (content ? strategy ? leadership ? equity)

- Performance bonuses (rewarded for viral content)

- Long-term stability (6+ months minimum, likely years)

- Product access (use the app, understand what you're marketing)

- Build something real (from 0 users to thousands)



If you're tired of one-off gigs and want to build something 

meaningful with growth potential, this is it.



________________________________________________________________________________________________________



Ready to join? Apply with your portfolio and answers.



Let's build!

title: Shopify Developer
description:
We’re looking for a reliable part-time Shopify Developer to help us ship weekly improvements to our Shopify store. 



This is ongoing work focused on CRO experiments, theme updates, speed improvements, and app integrations. You’ll work closely with our growth/CRO lead and follow clear tasks, priorities, and QA steps.



What You’ll Do:

-Implement CRO changes on product pages, cart, and checkout (when possible)

-Build and deploy theme updates (Liquid, JSON templates, sections, snippets)

-Improve site performance (Core Web Vitals, image optimization, script cleanup)

-Add/adjust tracking (GA4 events, Meta pixel, GTM support if needed)

-Support A/B tests (VWO or similar): variant setup, QA, troubleshooting

-Fix bugs, layout issues, responsiveness problems (especially mobile)

-Integrate/maintain Shopify apps (Klaviyo, reviews, subscriptions, bundles, etc.)

-Document changes and follow a simple release/QA checklist



Required Skills:

-Strong Shopify theme development experience (Liquid, HTML, CSS, JS)

-Experience working with OS 2.0 themes and sections / theme editor

-Comfortable with Git (or at minimum clean versioning + backups)

-Good debugging skills (browser dev tools, Shopify theme inspector, etc.)

-Can follow tasks precisely and communicate clearly



Nice to Have:

-CRO/testing experience (VWO, Convert, Optimizely, etc.)

-Performance optimization experience (CWV, Lighthouse/PageSpeed)

-GA4/GTM event implementation experience

-Familiarity with Klaviyo integrations and Shopify webhooks



To Apply (IMPORTANT)

Reply with:

-Your Shopify portfolio (stores/themes you worked on)

-Your hourly rate (or monthly rate) + weekly availability

-Your Shopify theme dev experience (years + favorite tasks)

-A short Loom (2–3 mins) showing one Shopify project you built or improved (optional but highly preferred)



Answer this: What’s the first thing you check when a Shopify page becomes slow?

title: Video Editor (B-Roll Focused – Talking Head Content)
description:
Rate: $1.25 – $1.50 per finished minute

(More consistent work available for strong performance.)

We’re looking for a skilled video editor who specializes in adding strong, relevant B-roll to talking-head content (finance/political style videos). This role focuses on clean editing and visual storytelling — no complex motion graphics or heavy effects required.

This is a long-term opportunity for the right editor.



Editing Style

For the reference video: youtu.be/PXD4h8MWBMw

We want you to observe:

How B-roll is placed





How it visually supports what the speaker is saying





How it enhances understanding without distracting





The overall edit does not need to be fast-paced. However, the B-roll placement should feel dynamic, intentional, and well-timed.



What We’re Looking For

Strong, relevant B-roll that directly supports the message





Good judgment in choosing visuals





No random or generic stock footage





Clear storytelling through visuals





The speaker should still appear on screen at times — this should not be pure B-roll throughout. However, B-roll should be prioritized so we can clearly evaluate your selection and storytelling skills.

title: Short-Form Video Editor (CapCut)
description:
Short-Form Video Editor (CapCut) – Part-Time to Full-Time



## About Us



We are a fast-growing digital content management agency working with top-tier creators across multiple platforms. Our team operates remotely and is driven by results, creativity, and attention to detail.



## The Role



We're looking for a skilled Short-Form Video Editor who lives and breathes CapCut. You'll be responsible for editing engaging, scroll-stopping short-form content (Reels, TikToks, Shorts) that drives views, engagement and audience growth for our creators.



This is a part-time to full-time position (approximately 2–6 hours per day), with the potential to grow based on performance and workload.



## What You'll Do



- Edit and produce high-quality short-form videos (15–90 seconds) using CapCut

- Apply smooth, well-timed zoom-ins and zoom-outs that enhance storytelling and keep viewers hooked

- Maintain a strong sense of visual aesthetics — clean compositions, appealing color grading, and on-brand styling

- Add text overlays, captions, transitions, and sound design where needed

- Work with raw footage and transform it into polished, platform-optimized content

title: Job Title: SEO & PPC Specialist (with Web Experience)
description:
Job Title: SEO & PPC Specialist (with Web Experience)

Reporting to: Marketing Director

Location: Hybrid 

Type: Full-time / Contract considered

Salary: Competitive

About the Role

We are looking for a results-driven SEO & PPC Specialist with solid website and digital marketing experience to work closely with our Marketing Director and help implement a proven, high-performance SEO strategy.

This is not a “start from scratch” role  we already have a clear digital direction, strong service offering, and growing pipeline. We now need someone capable of executing, refining, and scaling what works.

You will play a key role in driving organic traffic, generating qualified leads, and improving overall digital performance across search, paid ads, and website conversion.

Key Responsibilities

SEO Implementation & Growth

• Execute and refine an established SEO strategy across multiple service and location pages

• Keyword research, on-page optimisation, and content planning

• Technical SEO oversight (site speed, indexing, schema, structure)

• Monitor rankings, traffic, and conversions using GA4, Search Console, and SEO tools

• Implement internal linking strategies and authority building

• Work with content writers and marketing team to ensure SEO best practice

PPC & Paid Media

• Plan, launch, and optimise Google Ads campaigns (search & display)

• Track ROI, cost per lead, and conversion performance

• Ongoing A/B testing of ad copy and landing pages

• Manage budgets effectively to maximise return

Website & Conversion Optimisation

• Work with existing WordPress/website frameworks

• Create and refine landing pages for SEO and PPC campaigns

• Improve UX, page speed, and conversion rates

• Ensure all pages align with brand, SEO, and lead-generation goals

Reporting & Strategy Support

• Weekly and monthly performance reporting

• Provide insights and recommendations to Marketing Director

• Identify growth opportunities and quick wins

• Stay ahead of SEO and PPC trends and algorithm updates

About You

We’re looking for someone practical, commercially aware, and execution-focused.

Essential:

• Proven experience in SEO and PPC management

• Strong understanding of technical and on-page SEO

• Experience managing Google Ads campaigns with measurable ROI

• Working knowledge of WordPress or similar CMS

• Ability to interpret data and act on insights

• Highly organised and proactive

• Comfortable reporting directly to a director and taking ownership

Desirable:

• Experience with service-based or local lead generation businesses

• Basic HTML/CSS knowledge

• Landing page design or CRO experience

• Familiarity with tools such as SEMrush, Ahrefs, Screaming Frog, GA4

• Experience working in construction, property, or high-value services (advantageous but not essential)

What Success Looks Like

• Increased organic rankings and qualified traffic

• Consistent, trackable lead generation

• Strong ROI from paid campaigns

• Continuous website and conversion improvements

• Clear reporting and measurable growth

Why Join Us

• Work directly with decision-makers

• Clear, proven strategy already in place

• Opportunity to scale campaigns and make real impact

• Flexible working environment

• Performance-based growth and progression

How to Apply

Please send:

• CV

• Short summary of recent SEO/PPC results you’ve achieved

• Examples of websites or campaigns you’ve worked on

We are looking to appoint quickly for the right person.

title: VIDEO EDITOR
description:
About the Job:

We're a hair education brand looking for a skilled video editor to transform 10 professionally recorded full-length haircut tutorial videos into engaging short-form content for Instagram Reels and TikTok. You'll be responsible for repurposing this footage into a variety of content formats including before & after reveals, tips & tricks clips, full process breakdowns, satisfying transformations, and trending-style edits. The goal is to create scroll-stopping content that educates and entertains, helping us grow our audience across social platforms. This is an ongoing remote position with potential for long-term collaboration as we produce more content.



Ideal Candidate:

You're someone who lives and breathes short-form video. You understand what makes people stop scrolling on TikTok and Reels, and you know how to structure a 15–60 second clip for maximum engagement. You have experience editing beauty, grooming, or education content and can take raw tutorial footage and turn it into multiple unique pieces without being told exactly what to do you bring creative ideas to the table. You stay on top of trends, know how to use text overlays, captions, sound design, and pacing to keep viewers hooked, and you take pride in delivering polished work on time.



Job Requirements:

Proven experience editing short-form content for TikTok and/or Instagram Reels (portfolio or samples required)

Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, CapCut, or DaVinci Resolve

Strong understanding of social media trends, hooks, transitions, and pacing for short-form video

Ability to add captions, text overlays, sound effects, and music in a clean, professional way

Experience repurposing long-form content into multiple short-form clips

Reliable internet connection and ability to handle large video files remotely

Strong communication skills and ability to meet deadlines consistently

Experience in the beauty, barbering, or hair education niche is a plus but not required



Hiring Process:

To ensure we find the right fit, shortlisted candidates will receive one sample video from our library. You'll be asked to create a short-form edit (Reel or TikTok style) using that footage to showcase your creativity, editing skills, and understanding of our content style. The final hiring decision will be based on the quality of your sample edit. This is your chance to impress us, show us what you can do!

– Assist with other Shopify admin tasks when required (orders, inventory, markets, customer records, general housekeeping). You won’t be micromanaged. If something’s broken, we expect you to fix it — or tell us exactly how it should be fixed.



You are:



– A Gorgias power user (AI, automation, rules, views, reporting — hands-on and opinionated)

– Highly proficient in Shopify. Confident managing orders, inventory, markets, refunds, exchanges and customer edge cases without guidance

– 3+ years’ experience in a DTC customer service role, ideally in a fast-growing brand

– Comfortable working independently and making judgement calls

– Clear, friendly and excellent in written English

– Organised, pragmatic and relentlessly improvement-driven



Nice to have:



– Amazon Seller Central experience

– Wholesale / Faire experience

– International shipping knowledge (VAT, duties, incoterms)

– You like puzzles



Practical stuff:

– Free puzzles (obviously)

 the subject line of the

title: Appointment Setter
description:
Outbound Appointment Setter

About Cynergists

We provide advanced AI solutions designed to empower businesses to automate workflows, maximize productivity, and unlock limitless growth. We don’t just fill seats; we deploy operations. Cynergists is moving beyond traditional staffing to define the future of intelligent automation.

The Role

We are looking for a high-energy, resilient Outbound Appointment Setter to be the engine of our growth. You are the first point of contact between Cynergists and the business world. Your mission is simple: Open doors. You don’t need a decade of sales experience, but you do need "thick skin" and a relentless work ethic. Your goal is to spark curiosity, identify operational pain points, and schedule discovery calls for our senior consultants. If you are coachable, our proprietary AI Sales Trainer will help you master the art of the "hook."

Key Responsibilities

High-Volume Outreach: Execute daily outbound sprints via cold calling, personalized
, and LinkedIn outreach to identify potential clients.

The "Hook": Effectively communicate the value of AI automation to secure a spot on our consultants' calendars.

Lead Qualification: Briefly assess a prospect's current workflow to ensure they are a fit for our automation services.

Appointment Setting: Your primary KPI is Booked & Showed meetings. You bridge the gap between a cold lead and a diagnostic consultation.

Rapid Skill Development: Work daily with our AI Sales Trainer to refine your pitch, master tonality, and handle objections in real-time.

Pipeline Management: Utilize Go High Level (GHL) to track outreach, manage follow-ups, and ensure no lead falls through the cracks.

What We Are Looking For

Resilience: You view "No" as a request for more information. You have the stamina for high-volume outbound activity.

Coachability is King: You are hungry for feedback. You must be willing to train with our AI coach and adapt your approach based on data.

Tech-Savvy Mindset: You don't need to be a coder, but you must be excited about AI and comfortable navigating software.

Communication: Clear, confident verbal and written communication skills are non-negotiable.

GHL Experience: Proficiency in Go High Level is a plus, but not required if you are a fast learner.

Why Join Cynergists?

Cutting-Edge Training: Access to our proprietary AI Sales Trainer, providing you with real-time feedback and development.

Sell the Future: You aren't selling outdated services; you are selling the most in-demand technology in the world.

Uncapped Earning Potential: Competitive commission structure based on booked meetings and closed deals.

Remote Freedom: Work from anywhere with a supportive, innovative team.



To Apply

If you are ready to pivot your career into the world of Artificial Intelligence, submit your resume to 
 your cover letter, tell us why you think AI is the future of business.

title: Technical SEO Specialist (Webflow + Weglot Expert) - Part Time
description:
We are Danthree Studio, a high-end CGI agency for the furniture & tech industry. We are an SEO-first agency and rely heavily on organic traffic for our B2B leads. We are looking for a Technical SEO & AI Search Specialist to join our team.



?? READ CAREFULLY: We need a Code-Level Technical Expert, not a Content Writer or Generalist.



We work with a specific stack: Webflow + Weglot (International SEO). You must understand how they interact technically (Canonicals, Hreflang, Sitemaps).



YOUR RESPONSIBILITIES:

• Monitor Ahrefs Site Health and fix technical errors (Redirects, 404s, Canonicals).

• Create and implement custom JSON-LD Schema Markup (using 
 method, nesting Product/Service correctly).

• Implement GEO Strategies: Optimize our content and technical structure for AI Search Engines (ChatGPT Search, Google AI Overviews, Perplexity).

• Manage International SEO tags for our languages (DE, EN, FR, IT).

• Optimize technical performance (Core Web Vitals) in Webflow.



REQUIREMENTS:

1. Deep experience with Webflow CMS & SEO Settings.

2. Experience with Weglot (Subdirectories) and debugging Hreflang tags.

3. Ability to write/edit JSON-LD Schema manually (not just using plugins).

4. Proficient with Ahrefs, Screaming Frog, and GSC.

5. Semantic SEO / GEO Knowledge: You understand Entities, Knowledge Graphs, and how to use Schema to feed AI models.



HOW TO APPLY (MANDATORY):

To prove you are a human and an expert, please answer these 3 questions at the top of your application message. Applications without these answers will be ignored.



1. Question: A Webflow site uses Weglot. Google Search Console shows an "Unsupported File Format" error for the sitemap. You check the browser, and the sitemap looks fine (text is there). What is the likely technical error in the HTTP Header?

2. Question: We want to validly use "aggregateRating" (Stars) and "audience" properties in the same Schema block. 
 structure do you recommend to avoid validation errors?

3. Personality: What is your favorite tool for debugging HTTP headers and why?



We offer a stable long-term position and treat our team with respect. Looking forward to your application!

title: EMR Report Auditor & OASIS Application Expert – Home Health Agency
description:
Company: OMNISTARR Nurses

Employment Type: [Full-Time / Part-Time / Contract]



Position Summary:

OMNISTARR Nurses is seeking a Home Health Agency Expert to serve as an EMR Report Auditor & OASIS Application Specialist. This role is responsible for auditing EMR reports, ensuring accurate application of OASIS assessments, and supporting compliance, reimbursement integrity, and quality outcomes within the home health setting.



Key Responsibilities:

 • Audit EMR reports for accuracy, completeness, and regulatory compliance

 • Review and validate proper application of OASIS assessments (SOC, ROC, Recertification, Discharge)

 • Ensure documentation aligns with CMS, Medicare, PDGM, and agency standards

 • Identify documentation gaps that may impact reimbursement and quality measures

 • Provide corrective feedback and education to clinicians and leadership

 • Support quality assurance, compliance audits, and survey readiness

 • Monitor performance metrics and recommend process improvements

 • Maintain HIPAA compliance and patient confidentiality



Qualifications:

 • Active RN license preferred

 • 3+ years of home health agency experience

 • Strong expertise in OASIS-E, CMS regulations, and PDGM reimbursement

 • Advanced knowledge of home health EMR systems (HCHB, WellSky, MatrixCare, etc.)

 • Strong analytical skills with high attention to detail

 • Excellent communication and training abilities



Preferred:

 • Prior experience in QA, compliance auditing, or clinical review

 • Experience supporting accreditation or state survey processes

title: TikTok Shop Executive Assistant
description:
Mission For TikTok Shop Executive Assistant



To track tangible results and identify revenue generating creators for TikTok Shop brands by:

Finding creators’ TikTok usernames from their Discord handles

Creating creator campaigns on Growi and inputting creators’ Tiktok handles

Sorting through Discord server members to identify top-performing TikTok Shop creators

Reaching out to creators to be a part of 7-day posting cohorts

Handling additional weekly tasks that are assigned

Outputs // KPIs:

Track results and identify revenue generating creators

You’ll achieve this through these primary methods:

Finding creators’ TikTok usernames from their Discord handles

We host weekly coaching calls on Discord for each of our brands. We will give you a list of creators who attended each and you will find their TikTok handles.

Creating creator campaigns on Growi and inputting creators’ Tiktok handles

Using a creator tracking software called Growi, you will create a separate campaign for each coaching Call. Then, you’ll add each creator who joined the respective call to the campaign using their handle you found earlier.

Sorting through Discord server members to identify top-performing TikTok Shop creators

In all of our brand’s Discord servers, we implement a ticket system that allows us to maintain 1 on 1 communication with all the top creators. 

You will sort through all the members who join the Discord, find out their TikTok handle, and check their L30 day gmv on the TikTok Affiliate Center.

This is vital because it allows us to communicate with as many high potential creators as possible and maximize the number of videos they post.

Reaching out to creators to be a part of 7-day posting cohorts

We host 7 day posting cohorts where we take a group of 5 creators with potential to generate sales, put them in a group chat, and provide one video every day for them to replicate.

You will be in charge of identifying creators to be a part of these posting cohorts. Once you identify top performing TT Shop creators, you’re going to message them privately, asking if they want to be a part of the cohort.

Handling additional weekly tasks that are assigned

Turn new priorities from meetings, Slack, and ad?hoc requests into completed tasks with clear owners, deadlines, and visible progress. Ensure nothing falls through the cracks. 

Daily execution of team & administrative tasks

In addition to coaching the creators and maintaining these relationships, you will have a minimal amount of administrative tasks.

Daily Check-Ins:

Provide updates on what tasks you’ve been working on that day.

Report findings of what’s working and what isn’t.

Share ideas for improving client success.

End of Day Report

At the end of each work day, you will be expected to complete a form outlining everything you completed for that day.

Weekly Team Meeting

Attend team check-in meeting via Google Meet every week.



Competencies:

Proficient in English 

Part of your job will require you to outreach hundreds of creators. You must be able to write clear, friendly DMs and hold a proper conversation with creators as needed. 

Communication and responsiveness

You are active on Slack and respond to messages timely.

High ownership and bias to action

You don’t wait for instructions on what to complete each day. You take action relentlessly and own the operations you’re in charge of.

Whenever there’s a new batch of creators that join a brand’s Discord, you immediately begin looking them up on TikTok without me reminding you to.

Every week, there will be new tasks to handle. Upon hearing them, you will immediately spring to action and complete them as soon as possible.

Disciplined

A majority of your job will be manual work, but you’ll manage it at the highest quality. 

You follow instructions exactly, document what you’ve completed every day, and don’t skip steps.

Organized

You will be in charge of tracking hundreds or even thousands of creators. You’re on top of all the work you’re completing, ensuring that you have the proper systems in place to deliver the highest quality possible. 

TikTok Shop Experience

You have experience operating within TikTok Shop Seller Center, Tiktok Shop Affiliate Center, and using tools like Growi. 

You have a deep understanding of how to navigate through these platforms and look up creators usernames to find their L30 Day GMV.





Executive Assistant Position Description:

Time

You will have the freedom to make your own schedule. That said, it is crucial that you have access to the necessary tools (Slack) to handle replies during work hours

You will be expected to complete your end of day tasks every day Monday-Friday.

You will also be expected to be online M-F from 8am - 5pm EST: replying to creator messages and communicating through slack.

This position is remote, so you will have the freedom to work from anywhere. Please ensure that you have a strong connection and there are minimal distractions when on calls with clients.

Compensation

$1000/mo full time

Potential for added bonuses depending on performance



Please film a 5 minute max loom explaining:

1. Previous experience you've had with TikTok Shop - brands you've worked with, results you've driven, etc. Only people with TikTok Shop experience will be considered.

2. Why you are a good fit for the position.

3. How to find a creators' last 30 day gmv generated. Share your screen and show yourself walking through this.

title: Reddit Assistant
description:
We’re hiring people to manage daily activity on Reddit, including posting content and interacting within communities. This is ongoing work and requires someone who actually understands how Reddit functions, not just how to scroll it.



You’ll need at least one smartphone (Android or iOS both are fine). If you own multiple devices, that’s a plus and allows you to earn more. Expect roughly one hour of work per device each day.



Each day you’ll post content across several subreddits.



A critical part of this role is reading the room. The videos we provide can range from humorous to emotional to awkward or uncomfortable. You need to instantly recognize the tone and write posts that feel natural for that type of content. If you post everything the same way, you’ll fail.



You’ll also be responsible for finding appropriate subreddits for each video. That means reviewing community rules, understanding what performs well there, and making sure your post doesn’t look forced or out of place. If you can’t do that consistently, this position isn’t for you.



We’re looking for people who think independently, adapt fast, and don’t need their hand held. Prior Reddit experience is helpful but not mandatory if you learn quickly.



This is a long-term opportunity for dependable workers. Compensation is solid and can increase based on results and how many devices you use.



Earnings:

Most contributors earn $250–$500 per month, depending on consistency and the number of devices used.



Time Commitment:

Daily time commitment ranges from about 1 to 5 hours, depending on how many devices you’re using



To apply, include:

• how many devices you can work with

• your experience using Reddit

• when you’re available each day

title: Historical Story Hunter
description:
The Mission

We are looking for a Historical Story Hunter. This is not a typical virtual assistant role; it is a mission to dig through the "vaults" of time and unearth the strange, the tragic, and the unexplained. We are building a massive digital library of forgotten history, and we need a hunter who can track down original newspaper clippings from the 1800s and 1900s.



You will be responsible for stocking our "Content Bucket" months in advance. Your work will provide the raw, authentic evidence that makes history come alive for our global audience.



Your Daily Hunt

Your focus is volume, discovery, and organization. Your goal is to find 5–10 high-quality stories every day to fill our comprehensive library across US, UK, and Australian archives.



You will be hunting across these genres:



The Unexplained: Strange Sightings, Ancient/Forbidden Technology, Mass Panic/Hysteria.



The Tragic: Disasters & Catastrophes, Emotional/Aviation A
, Lost Expeditions.



The Mysterious: Maritime Mysteries, Unsolved Disappearances, Crimes & Scandals.



The Odd: Newspaper Oddities (strange 19th-century reports) and Australian Bushranger stories.



The Calendar: Building an "On This Day" Library that covers every day of the year.



The Hunter’s Toolkit (Daily Tasks)

Search the Archives: Use global digital vaults to find stories from a provided lead list.



Capture the Evidence: 

Save the full newspaper page (high-res PDF/Image).

Capture 5 targeted screenshots (The headline, the key paragraphs, the byline, and any sketches/photos).

Document the Facts: Create a simple text file for every story including: Publication Name, Date, Full Headline, Source URL, and a 1–3 sentence factual summary (Quite often a copy paste of data already on the page).

Organize the Vault: File everything into a structured Google Drive "Bucket" categorized by decade and theme for easy retrieval months later.



The Selection Challenge: Prove You’re a Hunter

We don’t want a resume; we want proof of your hunting skills. Please complete these four short tasks (Total time: ~15 minutes). Simply provide the screenshots and answers requested in your application.



Task 1: The End of an Outlaw (Trove - Australia)

The Source: 

The Goal: Open this report on the execution of the bushranger Ned Kelly.

What to send: A screenshot of the article. In your reply, tell me what his very last words were according to this specific report.



Task 2: The Capture at Glenrowan (Trove - Australia)

The Source: 

The Goal: Find the original news of Ned Kelly’s capture (the siege at Glenrowan), not his execution.

Search Tip: Focus your search on late June or early July 1880.

What to send: A screenshot of a report from that week (June 28 – July 5, 1880) showing the newspaper name and date.



Task 3: The Mary Celeste Mystery (Chronicling America - USA)

The Source: 

The Goal: Find a report on the "Ghost Ship" Mary Celeste published between December 1872 and June 1873.

Search Tip: Look for a detailed report from late February or early March 1873.

What to send: A screenshot of the newspaper scan showing the mention of the ship and the date.



Task 4: Your Instincts

The Goal: Based on the genre list in the "Daily Hunt" section above, tell me which genre of historical stories interests you the most and why?



Requirements

Precision: You can find exact dates and clean clippings.

Archival Quality: Your screenshots are clear, straight, and professional.

Independence: You love the thrill of the hunt and don't need hand-holding.

Reliable Setup: Stable internet and a computer capable of handling high-res images/PDFs.



How to Apply

Reply with a summary of why you are interested in this job along with the screenshots/answers from Tasks 1–4. 



All candidates will be considered, the taskings is for you to see if this is something you will enjoy doing and for me to see what kind of outputs you can produce. 



No prior archive experience? No problem. If you have a sharp eye for detail, a passion for the past, and strong English skills, we will help you to become a Master Hunter. Don't be shy :) 



This position is listed as 40 hours per week however it is open to part time and full time applicant. Pay reviews will be conducted every 3-6 months. 



Happy Hunting!

title: Elite Filipino PPC Strategist: Facebook & Google Ads Specialist
description:
THE OPPORTUNITY:



We're looking to hire a paid media specialist to manage medium-budget
 (Meta) and Google Ads campaigns for multiple iIndustries.  This is a part time/ full-time, long-term remote position.



YOU ARE THE IDEAL CANDIDATE IF:

? Platform Mastery: 5+ years hands-on experience with Meta Ads Manager 
/Instagram) AND Google Ads (Search, Display, YouTube, Performance Max)

? Results-Driven: Proven track record managing $1K–$15K+ monthly ad spend with documented ROAS improvements (share specific numbers in your application)

? Technical Proficiency: Expert-level skills in:

Conversion API (CAPI) setup & troubleshooting

Google Analytics 4 (GA4) & attribution modeling

A/B testing frameworks (creative, audience, landing page)

Pixel implementation & event tracking

Campaign budget optimization (CBO) & bid strategies

? Strategic Mindset: You don't just "run ads" – you build full-funnel strategies (awareness ? consideration ? conversion ? retention)

? Data Obsessed: You live in the numbers – CTR, CPC, CPA, ROAS, LTV, MER. You can diagnose performance issues and pivot fast.

? Communication Excellence: Fluent English (written & verbal), responsive during [your timezone] hours, proactive status updates without micromanagement



BONUS POINTS FOR:

Google Ads Certification (current or recent)

Meta Blueprint Certification

Experience with  LinkedIn Ads, or Reddit Ads

E-commerce (Shopify/WooCommerce) or SaaS/B2B lead gen background

Copywriting skills or creative direction experience

HubSpot, Klaviyo, or other marketing automation familiarity



WHAT YOU'LL DO:



Own end-to-end campaign management: strategy ? setup ? optimization ? reporting

Conduct weekly performance reviews and monthly strategic pivots

Collaborate with creative team on ad assets (or create simple graphics in Canva/photoshop etc)

Build and maintain reporting dashboards (Google Data Studio/Looker Studio preferred)

Stay ahead of platform updates, iOS changes, and privacy regulations



WHAT WE OFFER:



Long-term Stability: We invest in our team – average tenure 2+ years

Flexible Hours



TO APPLY (READ CAREFULLY – AUTO-REJECT IF IGNORED):



Step 1: Subject line: "PPC Strategist – [Your Name] – [Years Experience]"

Step 2: In your cover letter, answer these 3 questions:

What's the highest monthly ad budget you've managed, and what ROAS did you achieve? (Be specific with numbers)

Describe a campaign that was underperforming and exactly how you turned it around.

What is your preferred campaign structure for a [your industry] account with $20K/month budget?

Step 3: Attach or link to:

Portfolio/case studies (before/after screenshots preferred)

Screenshots of recent campaign performance (blur client names if needed)

Link to your OnlineJobs.ph, Upwork, or LinkedIn profile

Step 4: Include your earliest start date and availability for interview if required



NEXT STEPS:

Top candidates will receive a paid trial project  to audit an existing account and present optimization recommendations. 

This is our mutual "test drive" before full-time engagement.

title: Technical SEO Specialist (Webflow + Weglot Expert) - Long Term
description:
We are Danthree Studio, a high-end CGI agency for the furniture & tech industry. We are an SEO-first agency and rely heavily on organic traffic for our B2B leads. We are looking for a Technical SEO & AI Search Specialist to join our team.



?? READ CAREFULLY: We need a Code-Level Technical Expert, not a Content Writer or Generalist.



We work with a specific stack: Webflow + Weglot (International SEO). You must understand how they interact technically (Canonicals, Hreflang, Sitemaps).



YOUR RESPONSIBILITIES:

• Monitor Ahrefs Site Health and fix technical errors (Redirects, 404s, Canonicals).

• Create and implement custom JSON-LD Schema Markup (using 
 method, nesting Product/Service correctly).

• Implement GEO Strategies: Optimize our content and technical structure for AI Search Engines (ChatGPT Search, Google AI Overviews, Perplexity).

• Manage International SEO tags for our languages (DE, EN, FR, IT).

• Optimize technical performance (Core Web Vitals) in Webflow.



REQUIREMENTS:

1. Deep experience with Webflow CMS & SEO Settings.

2. Experience with Weglot (Subdirectories) and debugging Hreflang tags.

3. Ability to write/edit JSON-LD Schema manually (not just using plugins).

4. Proficient with Ahrefs, Screaming Frog, and GSC.

5. Semantic SEO / GEO Knowledge: You understand Entities, Knowledge Graphs, and how to use Schema to feed AI models.



HOW TO APPLY (MANDATORY):

To prove you are a human and an expert, please answer these 3 questions at the top of your application message. Applications without these answers will be ignored.



1. Question: A Webflow site uses Weglot. Google Search Console shows an "Unsupported File Format" error for the sitemap. You check the browser, and the sitemap looks fine (text is there). What is the likely technical error in the HTTP Header?

2. Question: We want to validly use "aggregateRating" (Stars) and "audience" properties in the same Schema block. 
 structure do you recommend to avoid validation errors?

3. Personality: What is your favorite tool for debugging HTTP headers and why?



We offer a stable long-term position and treat our team with respect. Looking forward to your application!

title: Full-Time Virtual Assistant for Product Engineer (QA, Research, Admin)
description:
# Full-Time Virtual Assistant for Product Engineer (QA, Research, Admin)



## About Me



I'm the lead product engineer at a small, early-stage AI startup based in the US. I work remotely from Thailand (GMT+7). I'm looking for a reliable, detail-oriented Virtual Assistant to work with me full-time and help me stay focused on high-impact engineering and product work.



You'll take ownership of QA testing, research, document management, and general personal admin — the things that need to get done but don't need to be done by me. Think of this as being the right hand to a senior engineer at a fast-moving tech company.



This is a great role if you're curious about technology, enjoy variety in your work, and want to grow your skills in a tech startup environment. You don't need to be a developer, but you should be comfortable navigating web apps, spreadsheets, and picking up new tools quickly.



**Your timezone advantage:** I'm based in Thailand (GMT+7), just 1 hour behind the Philippines. You'll work normal PH business hours with near-perfect overlap — no late nights or early mornings.



**Important:** This role is a mix of professional and personal support. You'll help me with work tasks (QA, research, documents, issue tracking) as well as personal admin (travel, scheduling, errands). If you're only looking for one or the other, this probably isn't the right fit — but if you like variety and want to be someone's go-to person for getting things done, read on.



## What You'll Do



### QA Testing



- Test new features in the web app and Google Sheets add-on following test scripts

- Report bugs clearly with screenshots, steps to reproduce, and expected vs. actual behavior

- Verify bug fixes and do regression checks

- Help maintain a library of test cases



### Research



- Research technical topics, tools, APIs, and competitors when assigned

- Summarize findings in clear, well-structured documents

- Use AI tools (ChatGPT, etc.) to accelerate research — we'll train you on effective prompting

- Monitor competitors (features, pricing, content) with weekly summaries



### Document Management



- Organize and maintain Google Drive folders, documents, and spreadsheets

- Create polished documents for planning, research summaries, and internal stakeholder reporting

- Prepare meeting agendas and capture action items / follow-ups

- Maintain internal knowledge base and SOPs



### Data Quality



- Spot-check event data for accuracy (dates, URLs, descriptions, locations)

- Flag data issues and help maintain data quality standards

- Assist with data entry and cleanup tasks



### Bug/Issue Tracking



- Keep the issue tracker organized: tagging, deduplicating, and closing stale issues

- Format QA findings into clean, actionable bug reports

- Track issue status and follow up on blockers



### Personal Admin



- Organize travel (flights, hotels, itineraries)

- Manage personal calendar and schedule coordination

- Handle
 triage and basic correspondence

- Expense tracking and basic bookkeeping support

- General errands and personal tasks as needed



## Tools You'll Use



- Google Workspace (Docs, Sheets, Drive, Calendar, Gmail)

- Project management (e.g., Linear, Notion, or similar)

- Communication (Slack, Loom)

- AI tools (ChatGPT, Claude) for research assistance

- Web browsers for QA testing

- Basic spreadsheet skills (filtering, formatting, formulas)



## Requirements



- Excellent written English

- Strong attention to detail (this is critical for QA and data work)

- Comfortable learning new software tools quickly

- Self-starter who can work independently with minimal supervision

- Reliable internet connection and quiet workspace

- Available for full-time work (40 hrs/week), Mon-Fri during PH business hours



## Nice to Have



- Experience with QA testing or bug reporting

- Familiarity with tech startups or SaaS products

- Experience using Google Sheets add-ons

- Basic understanding of web applications

- Experience with AI/LLM tools



## What I Offer



- Full-time, long-term position

- Nearly identical timezone (no late nights or early mornings)

- Exposure to cutting-edge AI and SaaS technology

- Variety — no two days are the same

- Respectful, low-drama working relationship

- Training provided on all tools and processes



**Salary:** Competitive, based on experience. Please include your expected monthly rate.



## To Apply



Please answer these questions in your application:



1. Describe a time you found and reported a bug or error in a product, document, or process. What did you do?

2. What AI tools (if any) have you used, and for what purpose?

3. What is your expected monthly salary in USD?

title: Credit Operations Lead – Palayan
description:
**Important** - Must be based in these locations:



Cabanatuan. Palayan City, Laur and the other surrounding towns.



About TrustClub



TrustClub is building a global network of trust – where reputation becomes currency.



We help people and small businesses access opportunities, loans, and partnerships based on trust, not paperwork.

We believe trust should be profitable, and that communities grow stronger when people vouch for each other.



Ultimately higher trust means people can work with each other more easily and everyone gets richer. This is true across the world and we are starting with the Philippines, one town at a time.



Your Role:



We are launching BNPL & Micro Lending for everyone on the TrustClub network in Palayan City (this means everyone, we don't do credit scoring, we rely 100% on trust & the platform processes). 



Your job will be to run a controlled pilot of this. 



You will operate a credit system powered by reputation and vouching rather than credit bureau data. At a high level, it will be your job to ensure:



 • Loans are issued correctly

 • Risk exposure is controlled

 • Collections remain proactive (this shouldn't be needed within TC, but it's possible)

 • Default rates stay below 3% (currently at 0.6%)

 • Reporting is up to date and you have the data at your fingertips



You responsibilities: 



 • Credit Execution: Review and approve trust-based loan applications, verify KYC and vouching legitimacy

 • BNPL Management: Oversee daily BNPL issuance across selected merchants and ensure repayment cycles remain controlled and compliant.

 • Risk Control: Monitor outstanding exposure, track delinquency daily, and prevent risk stacking or over-leveraging of borrowers.

 • Collections Oversight: Proactively manage repayments, trigger vouching-chain accountability when needed, and resolve late accounts professionally.

 • Compliance & Documentation: Maintain full regulatory and partner compliance with accurate, auditable loan and repayment records.

 • Reporting: Deliver weekly performance reports covering active loans, delinquency, exposure levels, and merchant BNPL activity.



What We Offer



- Base pay plus growth bonuses

- Path to leadership

- The chance to change how the world measures trust

- The opportunity to change your region for the better

title: Full-Stack Developer - Web and Mobile (React / React Native / Node.js / TypeScript)
description:
About Us



We build custom web applications for clients across a range of industries. We are growing our team and looking for a skilled full-stack developer to work on an active client project and future builds using the same technology stack.

We use Replit as our primary development and deployment platform, with AI-assisted development tools playing a central role in our workflow. You will be working directly within Replit's environment, collaborating with our team to build, refine, and maintain production applications.



The Role



You will be joining us to work on an various client projects requiring ongoing feature development, bug fixes, and UI refinement required. We have a pipeline of future web and mobile applications that will be built using the same stack and development approach.



Your day-to-day work will include:



- Building and refining features across the full stack (frontend and backend)

- Applying designs from Figma/HTML mockups to the existing application layout

- Developing and maintaining mobile applications using React Native

- Writing clean, maintainable TypeScript code

- Troubleshooting and resolving bugs across the application

- Collaborating with our team via regular communication and project updates



Tech Stack



You should be comfortable working with most (ideally all) of the following:



Backend: Node.js (v20+), Express.js with TypeScript, PostgreSQL with Drizzle ORM, session-based authentication, No
er, PDFKit, Google Cloud Storage

Frontend: React 18 with TypeScript, Vite, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui (Radix UI), TanStack React Query v5, Wouter (routing), Recharts, Uppy (file uploads)

Mobile: React Native

What We Are Looking For



- Mid-level to senior full-stack developer (5+ years experience) who can work independently with minimal supervision

- Strong frontend skills with the ability to translate Figma designs and HTML mockups into polished, responsive UI

- Solid backend skills, comfortable building APIs, working with relational databases, and handling authentication flows

- Hands-on experience with React and TypeScript is essential

- Proven experience building and publishing mobile applications with React Native

- Experience with Tailwind CSS and component libraries like shadcn/ui is highly desirable

- Familiarity with PostgreSQL (or similar relational databases) and an ORM



- Good English communication skills (written and spoken)

- Reliable internet connection and a quiet working environment

- Available to overlap with Sydney AEDT (currently a 7am start in the Philippines)



Nice to Have



- Experience with Drizzle ORM or similar TypeScript-first ORMs

- Familiarity with AI-assisted development workflows

- Experience with Google Cloud Storage or similar cloud storage services

- Experience publishing apps to the Apple App Store and Google Play Store

- Previous experience working with Australian or Western clients remotely



How to Apply

Please include the following in your application:



- A brief summary of your relevant experience, particularly with React, React Native, TypeScript, and Node.js

- Links to projects or repositories that demonstrate your full-stack and mobile work (GitHub, portfolio, live projects, or app store links)

- A short description of your experience working with component libraries and translating designs into code

- Confirmation that: you are OK with using screenshot capture software for time tracking; are happy with Sydney working hours; are happy working an exclusive role (that means no freelance paid or unpaid work 'on the side'); and you would be willing to undergo a live technical assessment as part of the interview process.

title: Short?Form Video Editor (Real Estate) – Remote
description:
1. Role Overview

We’re looking for a fully remote Short?Form Video Editor who can move fast, think in hooks, and deliver clean edits under pressure. You’ll turn our real estate footage into scroll?stopping content for agents and builders, from the story idea and opening hook all the way through to final export.



This role is open to both gig?based and full?time, and it’s a strong way to stand out if you want to specialize in real estate and brand?driven storytelling.



2. About SH Films

SH Films is a real estate media company that helps agents and builders market properties and projects with high?impact video. We focus on listing walk?throughs, agent branding pieces, and builder process videos that show a home’s journey from dirt to finished product.



We work with professionals who care about their brand, speed, and quality. That means we value editors who can hit deadlines, communicate clearly, and still protect the quality of the final image.



3. What You’ll Own

You are responsible for turning raw real estate footage into short?form videos that agents and builders can’t wait to post.



You will:



Edit short?form videos (15–90 seconds) for Reels, TikTok, and Shorts from property tours, branding shoots, and builder content.



Develop or refine pre?production concepts: simple story arcs, shot lists, and edit structures that make each property or brand feel intentional.



Write or improve hooks and on?screen text that grab attention in the first few seconds and keep viewers engaged.



Create multiple cuts from a single shoot (hero edit plus several supporting clips).



Add captioning, callouts, and simple motion graphics that highlight features, benefits, and brand messages.



Ensure consistent color, sound, pacing, and branding across edits.



Work with tight deadlines and “rush” projects while staying organized and calm.



Communicate clearly about timelines, questions, and potential issues so we never miss a delivery.



4. What Success Looks Like

After 60–90 days, success looks like:



You can take a brief, reference examples, and footage and turn them into strong edits with minimal back?and?forth.



You consistently hit fast turnaround times (often 24–72 hours per project, depending on scope).



You perform well under pressure when multiple projects land at once, keeping communication clear and expectations realistic.



Your hooks and story structures increase watch time and engagement on client content.



Agents and builders start asking for you by name and referencing your previous edits as the standard.



5. Day?to?Day

A typical week might include:



Receiving several projects with clear deadlines and simple creative direction.



Reviewing footage, identifying the best visuals and sound bites, and mapping a short story arc for each edit.



Writing or refining hooks, on?screen text, and CTA frames that feel natural for real estate.



Editing for multiple aspect ratios, with an emphasis on vertical content.



Delivering final files, plus occasionally alternate versions (shorter cut, different hook, text/no text).



Handling last?minute or rush edits when a client needs something turned around quickly (e.g., before a listing goes live).



6. Requirements

Must?haves

Proven track record editing short?form video (Reels, TikTok, Shorts) with a portfolio or reel.



Experience crafting story ideas, hooks, and structures that keep people watching, not just cutting clips together.



Ability to work quickly and accurately, with short turnaround times and firm deadlines.



Demonstrated ability to stay calm and professional under pressure.



Proficiency in a professional editing tool (Premiere Pro, Final Cut, or DaVinci Resolve).



Strong sense of pacing, music, and visual flow.



Reliable internet and setup for fully remote work.



Strong communication skills and responsiveness in a remote environment.



Nice?to?haves

Experience with real estate, architecture, or lifestyle content.



Basic motion graphics skills (titles, callouts, simple transitions).



Familiarity with current trends and best practices for property content on social platforms.



7. Who You Are

You might be a great fit if:



You think like a storyteller first and an editor second: you care about the hook, the arc, and the payoff.



You enjoy working fast and feel comfortable with deadlines and occasional last?minute requests.



You’re organized with your timelines, folders, and exports, even when juggling multiple projects.



You want your work to actually ship and be seen daily, not sit in drafts.



You like the idea of growing into more work (or full?time) as you prove reliability and quality.



8. Role Logistics

Type: Open to both gig?based and full?time (we’re actively looking for people who can grow into more work).



Location: Fully remote.



Schedule: Flexible, but you must be able to hit short turnaround times and communicate clearly about availability.



Compensation: [Insert range / per?project / hourly details].



Reports to: [Founder / Creative Director].



9. How to Apply

Please send:



A short note about you and your experience.



Links to your portfolio or reel (ideally with short?form and, if possible, real estate or lifestyle examples).



1–2 examples where you were involved from pre?production or hook/story concept through to final edit.



Your typical turnaround window and preferred working arrangement (gig?based, part?time, or full?time track).



You can [include
 or form link] for submissions.

title: Senior Financial Modeling and Analysis Specialist
description:
Job Description: Senior Financial Modeling & Analysis Specialist

Location: Remote (Philippines)

Work Schedule: [EST/Business Hours]

Employment Type: Full-time



About the Role

We are looking for a high-caliber Financial Modeling expert to join our consulting team. This is not a "back-office" data entry role; you will be the architect of the financial tools our clients use to make multi-million dollar decisions. You will bridge the gap between complex data and strategic insights, building robust, audit-ready models from scratch.



Key Responsibilities

• Model Architecture: Design, build, and maintain complex financial models (DCF, LBO, 3-Statement, Merger Models, and Budgeting/Forecasting tools) in Excel.

• Client Advisory: Interface directly with clients to gather requirements, present findings, and explain model assumptions and sensitivities.

• Scenario Analysis: Perform "what-if" analyses and stress testing to evaluate potential business outcomes and risks.

• Data Integrity: Audit existing client models to identify errors, improve efficiency, and implement best practices in spreadsheet design (e.g., FAST Standard).

• Reporting: Translate model outputs into executive-level PowerPoint presentations and dashboards.



Required Qualifications

• Education: Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Accounting, Economics, or a related field. CPA or CFA (Level II or III) highly preferred.

• Experience: 5+ years of experience in financial modeling, investment banking, corporate FP&A, or management consulting.

• Technical Mastery: Advanced Excel skills (Power Query, VBA/Macros, complex nested formulas). Familiarity with Power BI or Tableau is a plus.

• Communication: Exceptional English verbal and written communication skills—capable of explaining technical financial concepts to non-finance stakeholders.

• Attention to Detail: An uncompromising commitment to accuracy and "zero-error" deliverables.



Compensation & Benefits

Competitive Salary. pay out every every 16th and 1st. 

Benefits: 13th-month pay

Leave: 8 days Holiday Leave plus 12 VL/SL (1 credit accrual per month).

Other benefits: to be provided upon hire

title: Elite ISA / Real Estate Cold Caller
description:
Are you a master of the phones? Do you have the "gift of gab" and the grit to turn a "No" into a "Yes"?



We are a high-performance Real Estate team, and we are looking for a world-class ISA / Cold Caller to dominate our outbound prospecting. We don’t just want a caller; we want a partner who takes pride in booking quality appointments and managing the pipeline like a pro.

title: Shopify Store Builder, GMC Compliant
description:
WELLBALANCE SL is a fast-growing e-commerce company operating multiple Shopify stores across Europe and North America. We focus on building scalable, compliant, and structured online stores designed for long-term stability and sustainable growth.



To support our expansion, we are looking for a highly precise Shopify Store Setup Specialist whose sole responsibility is building new Shopify stores from scratch. This role is focused on structure, accuracy, and compliance — not marketing, CRO, or creative work.



Tasks

 • Build Shopify stores from scratch using predefined templates, SOPs, and checklists

 • Set up store structure, pages, navigation, policies, and backend settings strictly according to internal guidelines

 • Ensure each store is fully compliant with Google Merchant Center policies

 • Prepare stores to be approval-ready for Google Merchant Center with no missing requirements

 • Follow SOPs precisely and document completion for each store

 • Perform detailed quality checks before internal handover

 • Build 2–3 Shopify stores per week while maintaining consistent quality and structure



Requirements

 • Proven experience building Shopify stores from scratch

 • Strong knowledge of Shopify backend: settings, pages, navigation, policies, and store structure

 • Experience with Google Merchant Center compliance and requirements

 • Highly detail-oriented with a precision-driven mindset

 • Naturally perfectionistic and attentive to small details

 • Ability to follow templates, SOPs, and checklists without deviation

 • Fast execution while maintaining accuracy and consistency

 • Ability to deliver error-free work at scale





Benefits

 • Fully remote position

 • Long-term collaboration with a fast-scaling e-commerce company

 • Clear processes, templates, and expectations

 • Competitive compensation based on experience and output





How to Apply



Interested candidates should apply with:

 • Their resume

 • A short explanation of why structured and precise work suits them

 • Examples of Google Merchant Center–compliant Shopify stores built from scratch



If you enjoy building Shopify stores by the book, with precision and consistency, this role is for you.

title: AI Music Producer
description:
Job Posting: AI Audio Producer & VA (Suno Specialist)

Role Overview

We are looking for a fast-paced, detail-oriented AI Audio Producer to create custom "Walk-Up Songs" for our brand and clients. You aren't just hitting "Generate"; you are an architect of sound who can take a reference track and replicate its energy, tempo, and vibe using Suno AI while customizing lyrics for a professional, high-end output.



Key Responsibilities

Reference Matching: Analyze a reference song’s "DNA" (BPM, genre, instrumentation, mood) and replicate that sound as closely as possible using advanced Suno prompting.



Lyric Architecture: Structure custom lyrics specifically for Suno’s engine. You must know how to use Metatags ([Drop], [Heavy Bass], [Staccato]) to ensure the brand name or hook hits with maximum impact.



Phonetic Tuning: Edit and "cheat" lyrics (using phonetic spelling) to ensure the AI pronounces brand names and client names perfectly every time.



Rapid Delivery: Turn around 2–3 high-quality variations based on a client brief within a short window.



Post-Production Polish: Basic mastering of the Suno output (EQ, leveling, and trimming) to ensure the song sounds professional over speakers or in social media content.



Technical Requirements

Mastery of Suno AI: Deep knowledge of V3.5/V4, including the "Upload Audio" reference feature and style-prompting.



Lyric Flow Knowledge: Ability to count syllables and write lyrics that fit a specific rhythm—avoiding "clunky" or "crowded" AI vocals.



DAW Proficiency: Experience with Audacity, FL Studio, Logic, or similar to trim the "Gold 30 Seconds" and normalize audio levels.



Quality Control: An ear for "AI hallucinations" (static, slurred words, or off-beat rhythms) and the discipline to discard subpar generations.



Preferred Qualifications

Experience in Sports Production or Event DJing.



Ability to isolate stems (vocals/instrumentals) for cleaner mixing.
