title: Remote Dental Admin & Recall Coordinator
description:
We are a growing private dental and aesthetic clinic in Surrey, UK, looking for a long-term, full-time virtual assistant with strong dental admin experience to own our day-to-day back-office and recall workflows. You will work closely with the clinic owner and an external UK-based virtual reception team, focusing on Dentally, data accuracy and keeping patients fully followed up. 



Open to full time or part time. If part time, there needs to be room to expand into full time if workload requires it.



ABOUT THE ROLE



This is a fully remote role (home-based) supporting a UK time zone, typically Monday–Friday (flexible on working hours as long as majority is within UK hours). You will not handle live phone calls; instead, you will be the "engine room" behind the scenes, managing Dentally, patient records, recalls and admin tasks so the clinical and reception teams can focus on patients.



This role requires someone who can work proactively and independently in the background. You will need to be highly comfortable with data, CRM systems, and creating reports. A key part of your role is managing upwards – regularly communicating with clinicians and the reception team through clear reports and task lists, highlighting what needs attention and ensuring nothing falls through the cracks.



Key responsibilities



DENTALLY & PATIENT DATA MANAGEMENT: 



- Log in to Dentally daily to review new patients and updates, checking that all new registrations are complete and accurate.

- Check that new patient enquiries have been added correctly, have appointments booked, and have received their treatment plans and information.

- Maintain excellent data hygiene: tidy records, consistent contact details, correct tags, accurate medical/dental history status (where provided by the clinic).

- Create and manage tasks in Dentally for the reception team and clinicians (e.g. "call to rebook," "awaiting X-ray," "send estimate").

- Build and maintain custom reports from Dentally data to support decision-making and identify trends or gaps.





RECALLS, RACTIVATION AND FOLLOW-UP



- Run recall and reactivation reports (exams, hygiene, and other key treatments) on an agreed schedule (e.g. daily/weekly).

- Build and maintain structured recall lists (due, overdue, lapsed) and keep them up to date as patients book, cancel or decline.

- Prepare daily call/WhatsApp lists for our UK reception partner, including notes and priority flags so they can efficiently contact patients.

- Send recall and reminder messages 
/SMS/WhatsApp templates) directly where appropriate and log all communication in Dentally.

- Track and record recall outcomes (booked, no answer, wrong number, declined, to contact later) to keep lists accurate and actionable.





NEW PATIENT JOURNEY & TREATMENT PLAN TRACKING



- Monitor new patient enquiries and consultations: check who has attended, who needs follow-up and who has not yet booked the next step.

- Track treatment plans (e.g. Invisalign, cosmetic, restorative) to see which are accepted, pending or inactive, and create follow-up tasks or lists.

- Work with the virtual reception team by providing updated lists of patients needing follow-up calls or
s, and reconciling outcomes back into Dentally.

-
 regular task lists and priority updates to clinicians and the reception team, clearly outlining outstanding patient actions required.



INBOX AND GENERAL ADMIN SUPPORT



- Manage the main reception/admin
 inbox and WhatsApp alongside the UK team: organise, triage, and respond to routine admin queries (receipts, invoices, forms, directions, basic information).

- Create tasks from
s and WhatsApp for the clinical or reception team where a follow-up is needed, and chase until completed.

- Produce simple reports or summaries of activity (e.g. weekly recall progress, outstanding treatment plans, key admin tasks completed).





FINANCE AND EXPENSES (BASIC LEVEL) 



- Support with simple billing and admin: checking that invoices have been generated, payments recorded, and outstanding balances flagged in Dentally.

- Assist with logging and organising clinic expenses and documentation in agreed spreadsheets or systems (training provided).





PERFORMANCE REPORTING & PRACTICE ANALYTICS



You will be responsible for extracting and reporting on key performance metrics from Dentally on a monthly basis to support practice growth and clinician performance management.



MONTHLY REPORTS WILL INCLUDE: 



- Revenue generated – total practice revenue and breakdown by clinician/practitioner

- Case acceptance rates – percentage of treatment plans accepted vs presented, by clinician

- Hygiene conversion rates – for dentists who refer to hygiene, track conversion from referral to booked hygiene appointment

- Treatment conversion – track enquiry-to-consultation and consultation-to-treatment conversion rates

- Diary efficiency – monitor appointment utilisation, cancellations, DNAs (did not attend), and gaps in schedules by clinician

- Patient retention – track active vs lapsed patients, recall compliance rates, and patient churn



You will prepare clear, digestible monthly performance summaries and
 these to the clinic owner and relevant clinicians, highlighting trends, successes and areas for improvement.





COMPLIANCE & CONTINOUS IMPROVEMENT:



- Help keep administrative aspects of compliance (e.g. CQC-related logs/checklists) organised and up to date as directed by the practice manager.

- Proactively suggest improvements to processes, templates, and workflows that can make the clinic run more smoothly and efficiently.





ABOUT YOU / ESSENTIAL EXPERIENCE:



- Minimum 2-3 years of experience in dental administration, dental reception or a similar role within a dental practice (onsite or remote).

- Hands-on experience using a dental practice management system (Dentally, Dentrix, Open Dental, Software of Excellence, etc.). Dentally-specific training will be provided, but you must already be confident working in a patient CRM/EHR.

Strong understanding of day-to-day dental practice workflows: new patient journeys, recalls, treatment plans, cancellations, and how a busy diary runs.

- Experience pulling reports, working with data and creating summaries or dashboards from practice management systems.



SKILLS & ATTRIBUTES



- Highly organised, detail-focused and comfortable working with reports, lists and spreadsheets.

- Comfortable with data analysis and creating performance reports – you understand what metrics matter and can present them clearly.

- Strong communication skills for managing upwards: you regularly update clinicians and teams via
 with clear task lists, reports and priority actions.

- Proactive: you notice gaps (e.g. patients not rebooked, recalls not sent, missing data) and act on them without waiting to be asked.

- Confident written English for patient
s, internal notes and professional reports.

- Tech-savvy, comfortable learning new tools and working in a cloud-based environment with stable internet and backup power.

- Reliable, discreet and comfortable handling confidential medical and financial information.





TRAINING AND SUPPORT 



You will receive:



- Induction training on our clinic workflows, Dentally setup and recall protocols.

- Guidance on which performance metrics to track and how to extract and format monthly reports.

- Ongoing support from the clinic owner and project manager, plus close collaboration with our UK virtual reception partner.



If this sounds like you, please apply with your CV and a short message describing your dental admin experience, which practice management systems you've used, and any experience you have creating reports or working with practice data.

title: Weekend Part-Time YouTube Shorts Editor (CapCut Expert) - $3.00/hr
description:
About the Role: We are looking for a talented and dedicated Full-Time Video Editor who specializes in creating high-quality YouTube Shorts. You will be responsible for editing engaging, fast-paced short-form content using CapCut.

title: Sales and Admin Support
description:
Central Precast is a growing precast concrete manufacturer based in Wallerawang, NSW. We supply concrete barriers, interlocking blocks, and custom precast solutions to civil, infrastructure, mining, and hire companies across Australia.

We are seeking a highly organised and proactive Virtual Assistant – Sales Support to assist our sales team with lead generation, CRM management, and quote follow-up to help drive consistent growth.

Role Overview

This is a full-time remote position focused on supporting the sales pipeline from prospecting through to quote follow-up and meeting coordination.

You will work closely with management and sales to ensure opportunities are captured, followed up, and converted.



Key Responsibilities

CRM Management

• Manage and maintain CRM system daily

• Update new leads, enquiries, and sales activities

• Track quote status and follow-up schedules

• Maintain accurate customer contact records

Prospecting & Lead Generation

• Research and identify new prospects (civil contractors, hire companies, mining, quarries, councils)

• Send professional Expressions of Interest (EOIs) via

• Build and maintain targeted prospect lists by geographical region

Quote Preparation & Follow-Up

• Assist in preparing and formatting quotations

•
 quotations to clients

• Conduct structured follow-up calls and
s

• Record outcomes in CRM

Sales Coordination

• Arrange face-to-face sales meetings by geographical area

• Coordinate appointments efficiently to maximise travel schedules

• Prepare daily sales reports

• Attend daily video meetings with the team

Mandatory Requirements

Skills & Experience

• Strong written and spoken English

• Clear and confident phone communication

• Experience with CRM systems

• Previous sales or telemarketing experience preferred

• Strong organisation and attention to detail

• Ability to follow structured processes

Technical Requirements

• Reliable high-speed internet connection

• Computer setup with dual screens (2 monitors)

• Noise-cancelling headset

• Professional video call setup (camera + microphone)

Work Environment Requirements

• Quiet, professional workspace

• No background noise (including animals, TV, or other people)

• Ability to attend daily video meetings with camera on



Performance Expectations

• Daily CRM updates completed

• Consistent outbound prospecting activity

• Quote follow-ups completed within 24–48 hours

• Meetings booked weekly by region

• Accurate reporting submitted daily

Work Hours

• Monday to Friday

• 8:00am – 5:00pm (NSW, Australia time zone)

title: Digital Marketing Account Manager – Agency (Healthcare Practices)
description:
Looking for a full-time digital marketing role with stable hours, ongoing client work, and a long-term position? We’re an established Australian digital marketing agency (operating since 2014) offering a stable career path, competitive pay, and a genuinely collaborative team across Australia and the Philippines. You’ll manage accounts for regulated healthcare providers, including local clinics and professional practices. This role is ideal for an experienced Digital Marketing Account Manager who is looking for: Employment stability with a long-term agency (not a startup)



*Fixed Philippines-friendly hours (Monday to Friday, 7:00am–3:00pm Manila time - currently 6am - 2pm due to Australia’s Daylight Saving time)

*Attractive, marketing-based pay 70,000PHP - 120,000PHP per month 

*10 paid leave days per year

*Additional paid time off over Christmas and New Year (for example, this year from 24 December to 6 January).

*Birthday and work anniversary gifts

*A friendly, structured team with daily support and collaboration



*** TO APPLY, COMPLETE THIS FORM 
 



Day-to-Day Responsibilities

*Client & Campaign Management

*Manage digital marketing projects for Australian clients

*Oversee
 Ads, Google Ads, SEO, and related marketing initiatives

*Act as the key liaison between clients and internal specialists, including by phone and sms

*Campaign Monitoring

*Monitor advertising campaigns weekly (Google and
) with paid media specialists

*Work closely with advertising specialists to identify issues and opportunities

*Ensure campaigns remain optimised and aligned with client goals

*Reporting & Performance Review

*Review reports prepared by the SEO and Advertising teams

*Ensure reports are logical, accurate, and easy to understand

*Communicate performance insights clearly to clients via written updates and/or video meetings

*Campaign Improvement & Strategic Input

*Contribute ideas to improve campaign performance

*Review competitors and market positioning

*Recommend website or landing page improvements

*Suggest creative changes to ad copy, visuals, offers, and messaging



*** TO APPLY, COMPLETE THIS FORM 



Required Experience

*Previous experience as a Digital Marketing Account Manager (required)

*Basic hands-on experience with
 Ads and Google Ads preferred 

*Understanding of SEO fundamentals

*Experience in healthcare marketing (e.g. dental, allied health, or other professional practices) is highly preferred.

*Experience working with Australian clients is a strong advantage

*Excellent English communication skills, both written and spoken



Personal Attributes We’re Looking For

*Strong attention to detail with the ability to spot issues quickly

*Confident communicator (including by phone/video calls) who can clearly explain results

*Highly organised, reliable, and skilled in time management

*Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data, not just report on it

*Proactive and solutions-focused

*Comfortable working in a fast-paced agency environment

*Team player who values collaboration and regular check-ins

*Calm, professional, and client-focused



You will manage established clients and work alongside dedicated Google Ads,
 Ads, SEO, and web specialists. The focus of this role is account management, performance oversight, and strategic input — not doing everything yourself, but you can do it if required. 



*** TO APPLY, COMPLETE THIS FORM

title: Senior Sales Closer (High-Ticket) - Phone + Chat/Email
description:
We operate in the luxury yacht rental & events space. We are hiring a Senior / Expert Sales Closer to convert high-intent, pre-qualified leads into paid bookings.



Leads are already qualified and sent to you with the necessary details. Your role is to:



- confirm remaining details,



- answer final questions,



- handle objections professionally,



- secure payment by sending the invoice and closing by phone and in writing.



This is a role for someone who is highly driven, very available, and extremely detail-oriented. Our process includes administrative execution (accuracy matters).



Key Responsibilities



Close pre-qualified inbound leads via phone and written communication (chat/email/WhatsApp follow-up).



Convert both:



- short-cycle deals (minutes), and



- longer-cycle deals (days/weeks, when needed).



Send invoices and ensure payment is secured to confirm the booking.



Manage follow-ups with discipline until the lead is closed or clearly disqualified.



Maintain strong administrative standards:



- clean notes, accurate deal status,



 - clear next steps and reminders,



- zero missed follow-ups.



Communicate clearly with the team to ensure a smooth handoff once payment is received.



Requirements (Non?Negotiable)



Proven experience as a Sales Closer.



Strong closing skills on the phone and in writing.



Comfortable closing high-ticket transactions (our deals range from $2,000 up to $500,000).



Professional English (spoken + written).



High responsiveness and availability (this is critical for inbound, high-intent leads).



Very strong attention to detail and reliability.



Stable internet, headset, and a quiet working environment.



Nice to Have



Experience in luxury, travel, hospitality, concierge, events, or premium services.



Experience handling high-net-worth clients with confidence, discretion, and professionalism.



Ability to manage negotiation calmly (value framing, urgency, clarity, objections).



Compensation



Base: $500/month



Commission: per closed booking (details shared during interview)



OTE (monthly): $1,000 – $5,000 depending on performance

High performers will earn more. Consistency and professionalism are rewarded.



How to Apply (Important)



To apply, please send:



A short summary of your closing background:



what you sold, typical deal size,



phone closing experience,



written follow-up closing experience,



your strongest closing environment (inbound/outbound).



Your estimated close rate (or best realistic estimate) and weekly volume handled.



Optional but recommended: a short Loom (2–4 minutes) introducing yourself and explaining your closing approach.



Start your application with this keyword on the first line: YACHT-CLOSER

title: Senior Recruiting Manager
description:
Compensation: 60,000 - 80,000 PHP / Month, Depending on experience

Location: Fully remote

Schedule: Monday to Friday, Flexible time

Employment Type: Full-time

Pay Frequency: Bi-Weekly

 

Job Overview

We’re hiring a Senior Recruiting Manager for a fast-growing agency that connects Filipino talent with high-paying U.S. companies that genuinely treat them well.



You’ll own the entire recruitment lifecycle: sourcing, screening, interviewing, and placing candidates. You’re not joining a recruiting team, you’re building one. And as the company grows, so does your role in scope, title, and compensation.



 

What You'll Do

Proactively headhunt and source top-tier candidates through job boards, LinkedIn, social media, referral networks, and direct outreach

Screen and shortlist candidates across a variety of roles (admin, marketing, customer service, executive assistance, etc.)

Build and maintain a robust pipeline of pre-vetted, interview-ready candidates so placements can happen quickly when new roles come in

Develop and refine screening processes, interview frameworks, skills assessments, and evaluation criteria to reliably identify top talent

Own the candidate experience from first touchpoint through placement, handing off to the ops team for client coordination and onboarding

Track all candidate activity and pipeline data in our ATS

Spot bottlenecks and inefficiencies in the recruiting workflow and propose improvements

As we scale, take ownership of managing and mentoring a team of recruiters, setting targets, reviewing performance, and upholding quality standards across the team

 

Must Haves

3-5+ years of recruiting experience, preferably in a staffing or agency environment

Proven experience headhunting on LinkedIn: Boolean searches, InMail outreach, and building candidate pipelines through direct engagement, not just posting jobs and waiting

Proven experience sourcing candidates through additional channels: job boards, social media, referral networks, and direct outreach

Experience screening and evaluating candidates at scale without sacrificing quality

Strong knowledge of the Philippine talent market and sourcing channels

Highly organized and detail-oriented, able to juggle multiple open roles and candidates at once

Self-starter who thrives in an early-stage, build-it-from-scratch environment

 

Nice to Have

2+ years in a leadership or team management role

Experience recruiting across multiple countries, not just the Philippines

Experience sourcing on multiple platforms

Familiarity with recruiting automation tools

Experience creating or documenting SOPs for recruiting processes



To Apply

title: Website project inquiry - Travel planning boutique & Service marketplace
description:
Dear team,



I am looking for a top-tier web designer/developer to build the digital home for my new brand. 

I am positioning myself as a Travel Architect, and my business model is hybrid: high-touch consulting (planning) combined with the sale of curated travel services and activities.

I have very specific and non-negotiable standards regarding the quality of the final product. 

I am not looking for a standard travel agency template, but a bespoke digital experience.

Specific Quality Requirements:



• Editorial Aesthetics: The design must follow a minimalist, high-end editorial direction (inspired by luxury boutique brands). 

This includes sophisticated typography pairings and a masterful use of white space to ensure the brand feels premium and uncluttered.



• Hybrid Functional Architecture: 

The site must seamlessly integrate two distinct funnels:

1. The Planning Studio: A section dedicated to my consulting process, emphasizing expertise through storytelling.

2. The Service Marketplace: A high-performance catalog of curated activities and services (hotels, private tours, etc.). 

This section must be visually consistent with the rest of the site and optimized for Inquiry-based conversion.



• Technical Excellence: Performance: 

The site must be ultra-fast (Core Web Vitals optimized) with a Google PageSpeed score of 90+.

• Responsive Fidelity: Perfect execution on mobile is mandatory; the luxury feel must be preserved on all screens.

• Micro-Interactions: I expect subtle, elegant animations and transitions that elevate the perceived value of the service.

• Multi-language : English, French, Spanish and Chinese 



Deliverables Expected:

• A scalable CMS that allows me to update my curated catalog independently.

• A secure, custom inquiry system for lead generation.

• SEO-ready structure and high-resolution media optimization (Retina-ready).



If you have the creative and technical capacity to deliver a site that competes with international luxury travel standards, please send me your portfolio and a preliminary quote.



Best regards,

John

Founder & Travel Planner

title: Senior Graphic Designer with Modern Skill with AI Prompting Master Skils and proven experience with Amazon
description:
ABOUT US



Since 2013, Prodigy Media has built more than brands — we've created an Amazon-native empire. With 12 years of proven success and 28+ product lines under our belt, we don't play small. Our mission? Launch culturally resonant, design-led, emotionally sticky products that dominate Amazon and beyond.



Now, we're leveling up — and we want a design assassin who’s mastered AI workflows, commands Midjourney like a wizard, and turns prompts into visual gold.



WHO WE WANT



This is not your average graphic design role. We're looking for a hybrid Creative Director / Prompt Engineer / Graphic Design savant who can:



Think like a marketer. Design like an artist. Prompt like an AI god.



You’ll own the visual storytelling for our brands, using both traditional tools and bleeding-edge AI systems to pump out Amazon-optimized assets that convert.



WHAT YOU’LL DO



Craft Ultra-High-Converting Amazon Ads – static, lifestyle, 
-tier, and scroll-stopping. Own A+ Content Design – full module execution with story arcs that build obsession. Design Labels & Packaging – pixel-perfect, regulatory-ready, and unforgettable on the shelf. Prompt, Edit & Produce AI-Generated Visuals – using tools like Midjourney, DALL•E, Runway, Spline, Veo3, Sora, and others. Run 3D Product Renders – via Blender, KeyShot, or AI-powered 3D tools. Develop Scroll-Hook Videos – using After Effects, Premiere, Runway AI, etc.



Systematize Brand Visuals Across 30+ Products – while keeping it all aligned, emotional, and conversion-focused.



WHO YOU ARE



5+ years in design, at least 2+ years in Amazon/e-commerce brand creative

Fluent in Adobe Creative Suite, Figma, Blender, After Effects

Pro-level Midjourney / AI prompt engineer – this is non-negotiable

Obsessed with Amazon visual psychology, packaging psychology, and design that sells

Able to juggle 10 brands and still hit deadlines

Operate with a Creative Director mindset — not just execution, but strategy

Bonus: Experience creating creative systems, art direction templates, or leading a team



MUST-HAVES

Portfolio with Amazon ads, A+ pages, labels, 3D renders, videos, and AI-gen examples

Real-world use of AI tools integrated into your workflow

Available Mon-Fri 5:00am–2:00pm PST

title: Full-Stack Video Editor & Thumbnail Designer (Vox / Documentary Style)
description:
The Role:

I run a high-signal YouTube channel called "Steady" (Niche: Psychology & Business and Marketing). I am looking for a full-stack visual storyteller to take my written scripts and turn them into finished, premium documentaries (1 video per month).



I am looking for a specialist who can handle the entire production process from end to end. We do not do "YouTuber hype" edits. We do cinematic, atmospheric video essays.



Style References:



Lemmino (Atmosphere & Silence)



Vox (Mixed Media & Paper Textures)



James Jani (Dark Backgrounds & Kinetic Text)



Your Responsibilities (From Script to Final Video):

I will provide the written script. You will handle:



The Voiceover: Generating a high-quality, human-sounding AI voiceover (e.g., ElevenLabs) that fits a serious documentary tone.



The Assets: Sourcing all archival footage, B-roll, music, and SFX. (Note: You must have your own premium stock library subscription like Envato Elements or Storyblocks).



The Edit: Motion graphics, kinetic typography, visual metaphors, and heavy sound design.



The Thumbnail: Designing one high-CTR, cinematic YouTube thumbnail that matches the documentary's vibe (leveraging templates from your premium stock library is highly encouraged to save you time).



Compensation:

Competitive Fixed Price Per Video. We are open to your rates. Because we only need 1 premium video per month, we are looking for quality over quantity. Please state your desired flat fee for this full A-to-Z production in your application.



How to Apply (Read Carefully):

To filter out mass-applicants and bots, please follow these exact steps:



Make your subject line: "STEADY - [Insert your favorite documentary channel]"



Send a link to just ONE video you've produced that proves you can do kinetic typography, sound design, and documentary pacing.



Attach or link to ONE YouTube thumbnail you have designed.



Briefly confirm that you have access to a premium stock library and a high-quality AI voice tool.



State your flat-rate fee to produce one 8–10 minute video per month based on the responsibilities above.

title: International Education Researcher
description:
About Us

Educational Records Evaluation Service (ERES) is a trusted evaluation agency in the United States, providing credential evaluation services for international students, professionals, and immigrants. 



Position Overview

We are seeking a detail-oriented and analytical International Education Researcher to join our growing team. This role is ideal for someone passionate about global education systems and experienced in comparing international academic credentials against U.S. standards.

You will play a key role in supporting our credential evaluation team by conducting in-depth research on foreign education systems, academic policies, institutional recognition, grading practices, and program structures.



Responsibilities

• Conduct thorough research on education systems, qualifications frameworks, and credential structures across various countries

• Analyze foreign academic documents and provide insight into degree equivalencies

• Develop and maintain internal country-specific education profiles and databases

• Verify institutional recognition and program accreditation

• Collaborate with evaluation staff to provide timely, well-documented guidance on complex cases

• Monitor changes in global education systems, policies, and credential types

• Participate in professional development and networking related to international education

Qualifications

• Bachelor’s degree required; Master’s degree in Education, International Studies, Library Science, Linguistics, or a related field preferred

• Experience in international education, credential evaluation, academic research, or comparative education highly preferred

• Strong analytical and writing skills

• High attention to detail and accuracy

• Ability to work independently and manage multiple research tasks

• Familiarity with databases and education resource tools) is a plus

• Multilingual ability is a plus



Why Join Us?

• Flexible work environment

• Opportunity to contribute to educational equity and international mobility

• Work with a collaborative, mission-driven team

• Room for professional growth and contribution to policy shaping



How to Apply

Please submit your resume, a brief cover letter, and one writing sample (preferably related to education or research) via Google Drive or another accessible online platform link within the "Onlinejobs" messaging system.

We welcome applicants from diverse backgrounds and experiences. Applications will be reviewed on a rolling basis.

title: Appointment Setter
description:
Outbound Appointment Setter

About Cynergists

We provide advanced AI solutions designed to empower businesses to automate workflows, maximize productivity, and unlock limitless growth. We don’t just fill seats; we deploy operations. Cynergists is moving beyond traditional staffing to define the future of intelligent automation.

The Role

We are looking for a high-energy, resilient Outbound Appointment Setter to be the engine of our growth. You are the first point of contact between Cynergists and the business world. Your mission is simple: Open doors. You don’t need a decade of sales experience, but you do need "thick skin" and a relentless work ethic. Your goal is to spark curiosity, identify operational pain points, and schedule discovery calls for our senior consultants. If you are coachable, our proprietary AI Sales Trainer will help you master the art of the "hook."

Key Responsibilities

High-Volume Outreach: Execute daily outbound sprints via cold calling, personalized
, and LinkedIn outreach to identify potential clients.

The "Hook": Effectively communicate the value of AI automation to secure a spot on our consultants' calendars.

Lead Qualification: Briefly assess a prospect's current workflow to ensure they are a fit for our automation services.

Appointment Setting: Your primary KPI is Booked & Showed meetings. You bridge the gap between a cold lead and a diagnostic consultation.

Rapid Skill Development: Work daily with our AI Sales Trainer to refine your pitch, master tonality, and handle objections in real-time.

Pipeline Management: Utilize Go High Level (GHL) to track outreach, manage follow-ups, and ensure no lead falls through the cracks.

What We Are Looking For

Resilience: You view "No" as a request for more information. You have the stamina for high-volume outbound activity.

Coachability is King: You are hungry for feedback. You must be willing to train with our AI coach and adapt your approach based on data.

Tech-Savvy Mindset: You don't need to be a coder, but you must be excited about AI and comfortable navigating software.

Communication: Clear, confident verbal and written communication skills are non-negotiable.

GHL Experience: Proficiency in Go High Level is a plus, but not required if you are a fast learner.

Why Join Cynergists?

Cutting-Edge Training: Access to our proprietary AI Sales Trainer, providing you with real-time feedback and development.

Sell the Future: You aren't selling outdated services; you are selling the most in-demand technology in the world.

Uncapped Earning Potential: Competitive commission structure based on booked meetings and closed deals.

Remote Freedom: Work from anywhere with a supportive, innovative team.



To Apply

If you are ready to pivot your career into the world of Artificial Intelligence, submit your resume to 
 your cover letter, tell us why you think AI is the future of business.

title: Ourbound sales closer
description:
About ServeHub



ServeHub is a modern SaaS platform that helps home service businesses (landscaping, cleaning, contractors, and field service companies) manage their operations, automate workflows, and grow their revenue. ServeHub provides tools for CRM, job management, estimates, invoicing, messaging, and automation in one simple platform.



Our mission is to help service businesses operate more efficiently and grow faster.

?

You will also perform outreach through social media and messaging platforms to generate new leads.

?

, Instagram, LinkedIn

 and messaging tools

title: Amazon Account Manager / Operations Manager
description:
Are you a strategic, data-driven brand builder with a passion for Amazon?

We are a fast-growing Amazon private label brand looking for a full-time Amazon Account Manager to take ownership of our product development pipeline, listing optimization, and brand positioning.



You’ll play a key leadership role in launching products, optimizing conversion rates, and developing a strong, consistent brand presence. This is a long-term opportunity with potential for growth in a collaborative, performance-driven environment.



Key Responsibilities

-Accountability & Ownership

-Lead and maintain a robust product development pipeline (from idea to launch)

-Optimize product listings for maximum visibility and conversions

-Manage all branding, positioning, and messaging efforts

-Implement CRO strategies and run continuous A/B tests

-Coordinate freelancers (designers, photographers, content creators)

-Monitor and improve brand health metrics: rankings, reviews, CTR, CR, etc.



Daily & Weekly Tasks

-Research product trends and discover new product ideas

-Analyze competitors for differentiation and CRO opportunities

-Track performance: sessions, conversion rates, sales rank

-Collaborate with supply chain, PPC, and creative teams to align launch and inventory strategies



Long-Term Projects & Goals

-Build a consistent and strategic brand identity across all customer touchpoints

-Establish a repeatable, scalable system for product launches

-Increase customer loyalty and retention through compelling branding and messaging



 Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)

KPI 1: Product Development Pipeline

Objective: Develop and maintain a validated pipeline of launch-ready products

Metrics: 

-Number of product ideas researched and validated monthly

-Number of products launched per quarter

-First 90-day sales & review performance



Actions:

-Run research & validation using Helium 10 and market analysis

-Coordinate with suppliers, creatives, and PPC

-Maintain and update Product Pipeline Tracker



KPI 2: Conversion Rate Optimization

Objective: Improve listing performance through CRO strategies

Metric: Conversion Rate (%) from Amazon Business Reports

Actions:

-Optimize listings, copy, and A+ content

-Improve visuals and run split tests

-Monitor and iterate based on data and performance feedback



 Qualifications & Skills

Required:

-3+ years of experience managing private label brands on Amazon

-Proven success with multiple product launches

-Deep understanding of Amazon SEO and the Amazon algorithm

-Expertise in Helium 10, keyword research, and listing optimization

-Skilled in briefing and coordinating designers and content teams

-Familiarity with A+ content, storefront management, and conversion tracking



Preferred:

-Background in marketing, branding, or e-commerce growth strategy

-Knowledge of CRO tools and testing platforms (e.g., ManageByStats, Splitly)

-Experience using tools like Asana, Notion, or Trello for project management

-Awareness of PPC’s influence on organic ranking



 Soft Skills:

-High attention to detail and ownership mentality

-Strong marketing sense and customer-centric thinking

-Excellent written and verbal English communication

-Organized, self-driven, and proactive

-Analytical mindset – able to turn data into decisions



 What We Offer

-Competitive rates

-Fully remote, flexible working hours

-Bi-weekly payments and performance reviews

-Long-term role with growth potential

-Paid leave and additional benefits after 6 months (SSS, Pag-ibig, health insurance)

-Supportive team culture with room for innovation and contribution

-Training resources and personal development opportunities



 How to Apply:

1. Include in subject line: “[Your Favorite Book] - Amazon Brand Manager Application”

2. Attach your updated resume

3. Include a short video (2–3 min) introducing yourself and describing your:

-Experience with Amazon product research

-Tools you’ve used and how you used them

-One product you’ve helped launch and what made it successful

4. Complete the internet speed test from speedtest.net and attach a screenshot

5. Attach a screenshot with your computer specs.



Why Join Us?

This is more than just a brand management job. It’s an opportunity to lead, build, and scale something meaningful. If you’re driven by impact, autonomy, and a clear path to success, we’d love to meet you.

title: Supply Chain & Inventory Planning Manager (Full Time)
description:
We are a fast-growing e-commerce fashion bag brand based in Singapore.



We are looking for a highly analytical, systems-driven Supply Chain & Inventory Planning Manager to take full ownership of our inventory planning engine and supply chain performance.



If you enjoy building forecasting systems, optimizing inventory turns, preventing stockouts, and turning messy data into structured decision-making - this role is for you. This is a decision-making role - not a coordination role.



[Role Overview]

You will own our end-to-end inventory planning and supply chain optimization process.



Your primary responsibility is to ensure:

- We do not run out of stock

- We do not over-order

- Cash is not trapped in aging inventory

- Inventory is allocated correctly across markets

- Lead times are tracked and optimized

- You will build, refine, and manage the systems that determine when and how much we reorder.



You will work closely with:

- Founders

- Operations Executive

- 3PL partners

- Suppliers



[Key Responsibilities]

1. Demand Forecasting & Replenishment Planning

- Maintain and improve SKU-level forecasting models (Google Sheets-based)

- Track daily/weekly sales velocity by SKU

- Build reorder logic based on lead time, safety stock, and MOQ

- Recommend purchase quantities and reorder timing

- Identify potential stockout risks at least 60 days in advance



2. Inventory Optimization

- Monitor inventory levels across SG and US warehouses

- Allocate inventory strategically between markets

- Track inventory turnover rate

- Identify slow-moving and aging SKUs

- Recommend action plans (bundling, promotions, discontinuation)



3. Supplier & Lead Time Management

- Track production timelines

- Monitor actual vs expected lead times

- Flag delays and risk areas early

- Optimize MOQ decisions and production batching



4. Freight & Logistics Optimization

- Recommend shipping mode (air vs sea) based on margin and urgency

- Coordinate inbound shipments with Ops team



5. Reporting & Performance Tracking

- Maintain weekly supply chain dashboard

Report on:

- Stock cover (days of inventory)

- OOS risk

- Inventory aging

- Inventory turns

- Open PO pipeline

- Conduct monthly supply chain review with founders



[Success Metrics]

You will be evaluated on:

- Stockout rate

- Inventory turnover improvement

- Reduction in aged inventory

- Forecast accuracy

- On-time PO execution



[Who This Role Is For]

- Highly analytical and comfortable working with data

- Strong Excel / Google Sheets skills (required)

- Experience in inventory planning or supply chain management

- Process-driven and systems-oriented

- Comfortable making recommendations based on numbers

- Proactive in identifying risks early



[Who This Role Is NOT For]

- Someone who only wants to coordinate shipments

- Someone uncomfortable with numbers and forecasting

- Someone who prefers reactive execution instead of proactive planning

- Someone who needs constant supervision



[Requirements]

- 3+ years experience in supply chain, inventory planning, or operations

- Experience in e-commerce or DTC brand preferred

- Strong understanding of MOQs, lead times, safety stock, reorder points

- Advanced proficiency in Google Sheets or Excel

- Strong communication skills (written and verbal)

- Comfortable working remotely and independently



[What We Offer]

- Fully remote role

- High ownership and autonomy

- Opportunity to build a supply chain system from the ground up

- Direct collaboration with founders

- Performance-based growth opportunities



APPLY AT THIS LINK:

title: Social Media Growth & Engagement Specialist
description:
The Mission

Apex-Emerald-AI is an automation-first agency. We have the content and the tech; now we need the human engine to spark the conversations. We aren't looking for a "VA" to do data entry—we are looking for a Growth Scout to find the right rooms, add value, and pull high-intent leads into our automated ecosystem.



There is NO cold calling required. Your job is "Social Warming." You find the leads; our automated systems handle the calls.



Your Key Responsibilities:

Strategic Infiltration: Join and monitor specific industry groups (UK & UAE focus) on LinkedIn and
 as directed.



Authority Building: Engage with industry leaders and prospects by commenting and providing genuine value (no spam).



Growth Tracking: Proactively grow our follower base across LI, Instagram, FB, X, and TikTok.



The "Trigger" Hand-off: Identify high-intent engagement. The moment a prospect asks a "How-to" or "Discovery" question, you capture their details and flag them for the Founder.



Daily Reporting: Provide a concise EOD (End of Day) report on follower growth and "Hot Leads" generated.



Requirements:



An Expert in all Social Media channels



UK & UAE Market Fluency: You must understand the cultural nuances of doing business in London and Dubai.



High-Level English: Your writing must be professional, sharp, and "human"—not robotic or templated.



Social Native: You know how to navigate LinkedIn, X, and TikTok algorithms to get eyes on content.



Initiative: You don't wait for a script; you spot an opportunity and engage.



Compensation & Growth:

Base Pay: Competitive part-time hourly/monthly rate (to be discussed).



The  Bonus: You get a direct financial bonus for:



Every Qualified Conversation handed off to the Founder.



Every Closed Deal that originated from your outreach/infiltration efforts.



Career Path: This is a part-time role with the immediate potential to grow into a full-time as role as Apex-Emerald-AI scales.



How to Apply (Strict Requirements):



This is NOT a role for a first-time VA. To be considered,
 your CV to: 
 with the following:



Proof of Experience: Provide a written referral or case study for 3 past employers or projects where you successfully grew a social presence or generated B2B leads.



The Comparison: Briefly explain the main difference in "tone" you would use when messaging a CEO in London vs. a Business Owner in Dubai.



The Infiltration: Identify two specific LinkedIn groups (one UK, one UAE) that would be high-value for an AI Automation agency to find clients.



The Bridge: A prospect in a group asks: "I have too many leads and I can't keep up with the follow-up. Any advice?" Write the 2-sentence comment you would post to get their attention without sounding like a salesman.

title: Bookkeeper, Video Editor, Odd Jobs
description:
I am seeking a VA for assistance with both work and personal tasks.



I am a sole proprietor working as a pain and injury rehab specialist. I operate a private clinic business. My biggest areas of need are bookkeeping, website maintenance, and video editing for social media.



I require a VA who is fluent in Excel for bookkeeping tracking (preferred form of reporting for my accountant) for both my business and my personal finances.



For website and social media, I edit my website in cPanel and host through Namecheap, so familiarity or ability to become familiar with those platforms for basic maintenance will be required. I will not need content creation for my social media, but the ability to splice and cut my speaking videos into watchable pieces is my greatest need on this side, so fluency with the English language is vital. Some help with creating graphics may be requested from time-to-time using provided photos. I may also request help with Powerpoint presentations as well.

title: Growth Operations VA (SEO, Ads & Booking Performance)
description:
About the Role



Forbidden Well is hiring a disciplined, execution-focused Growth Operations VA to manage and optimize the systems that directly drive bookings, revenue, and online visibility.



This is not a strategy or creative leadership role. This is a structured execution position with clear KPIs, reporting standards, and measurable performance expectations.



Compensation Structure



Base: $1,000 per month

Performance Bonus: $10 for every qualified booking generated through ForeverBooked ads



This role is performance-driven. The more bookings generated, the more you earn.



Full-time: 40 hours per week

Must be available during New York (EST) business hours.



Core Systems You Will Manage



• Zenoti (CRM, Appointment Booking & Client Management)

• Klaviyo 
 Marketing)

• ForeverBooked (Paid Ads & Lead Follow-Up)

• SearchAtlas (SEO Execution)

• ClickUp (Task & Document Organization)



Primary Responsibilities



Zenoti Management & Booking Operations



• Manage appointment booking, rescheduling, and cancellations inside Zenoti

• Ensure accurate client profiles, notes, tags, and service records

• Monitor daily appointment flow and booking accuracy

• Update services, pricing, and availability as directed

• Track bookings generated from ads and campaigns

• Ensure proper attribution and data accuracy

• Identify and report booking friction or system errors

• Maintain clean, organized CRM records at all times



SEO & Visibility (Primary Focus)

• Execute ongoing SEO strategy using SearchAtlas and Atlas Brain

• Continuously identify and implement opportunities to improve organic rankings

• Optimize content for both traditional search engines and LLM-driven discovery (AI search visibility)

• Publish and refine SearchAtlas-generated content weekly

• Optimize meta titles, descriptions, headings, schema, and on-page structure

• Implement and expand internal linking strategy

• Monitor keyword movement, impressions, crawl health, and page performance

• Improve entity relevance and topical authority for LLM indexing

• Draft weekly Google Business Profile posts

• Provide measurable SEO performance reporting with clear growth metrics



ForeverBooked Ads & Lead Management

• Upload and manage approved ads

• Monitor daily spend, CPL, and lead flow

• Call hot leads within 5–10 minutes of submission

• Qualify leads and book appointments

• Log all outcomes and bookings accurately



Klaviyo
 Execution

• Execute minimum 2 campaigns per week

• Maintain core automated flows

• Perform list segmentation and hygiene

• Track revenue attribution and engagement metrics



Operations & Organization

• Use ClickUp to manage all tasks and documentation

• Organize internal company documents

• QA booking links, forms, and tracking systems



Reporting Requirements (Mandatory)



Daily End-of-Day Report

• Hours worked

• Tasks completed

• Systems used

• Work in progress



Bi-Weekly KPI Report (Before Payroll)

• SEO metrics (keyword movement, impressions, content published)

•
 metrics (campaigns, sends, opens, clicks, revenue)

• Ads metrics (spend, leads, bookings, CPL)

• Total bookings generated

• Summary of results achieved



Performance is measured strictly by data.



Brand Standards



Forbidden Well operates with a defined luxury brand identity.

Strict adherence to brand voice and direction is required.



Strategy remains with the Founder.



Ideal Candidate



• Strong experience with SEO execution tools

• Comfortable making outbound calls to warm leads. American Accent.

• Experienced with Klaviyo and paid ads platforms

• Highly organized and process-driven

• Comfortable working within structured accountability

mber to join our growing brand family. If you love beauty, content creation, customer experience, and working in a dynamic, fast-paced environment, we would love to meet you.

, Instagram, TikTok Shop, and
.

title: Appointment Setter - Real Estate
description:
VA Cold Caller (Real Estate - Multifamily



Location: Remote

Employment Type: Full
 Time



About Us:



We specialize in helping real estate investors scale quickly and efficiently by leveraging strategic assets like virtual assistants (VAs). We’re looking for a motivated and experienced VA Cold Caller to join our team and play a crucial role in driving our clients' success in acquiring multifamily properties.



Job Overview:

As a VA Cold Caller, you will be responsible for qualifying leads through outbound cold calls to potential sellers and investors. Your focus will be on multifamily properties in the U.S., helping our clients expand their portfolios. This role requires strong communication skills, persistence, and a deep understanding of the real estate market.



Key Responsibilities:



Conduct outbound cold calls to property owners, investors, and other potential leads.

Qualify leads based on specific criteria and gather relevant property information.

Set appointments or forward qualified leads to the clients  for further action.

Maintain accurate records of calls and leads in our CRM system.

Follow up with leads as necessary to nurture relationships and close deals.

Collaborate with the team to refine scripts, strategies, and processes for improved results.



Requirements:



At least 1 year of experience in cold calling or appointment setting, preferably in real estate.

Familiarity with U.S. real estate, especially multifamily properties, is a strong plus.

Excellent verbal communication skills in English.

Ability to handle rejection and stay motivated to achieve targets.

Experience using CRM systems and other call management tools.

Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.

Reliable internet connection and a quiet work environment.



How to Apply: If you’re a driven professional with a passion for real estate and cold calling, we’d love to hear from you! Please submit your application here with attached resume. Please use the subject "REIA Applicant Cold Calling _ your name"

title: Experienced Business Funding VA (0% Credit Card Stacking & High-Limit Approvals)
description:
We are a fast-growing U.S.-based business funding company helping entrepreneurs access $50K–$250K+ in 0% business credit and strategic financing.



We are looking for a highly experienced Virtual Assistant who understands business funding at a deep level — not just processing applications, but structuring profiles for maximum approvals.



This is NOT an entry-level position.



You must have real experience funding clients through major U.S. banks and lenders.



Responsibilities



You will be responsible for:



• Structuring and processing 0% business credit card applications

• Managing client funding strategy (stacking 3–5 cards strategically)

• Working with major banks including:

• Chase (Ink, Unlimited, etc.)

• American Express (Business Gold, Platinum, etc.)

• Bank of America

• Wells Fargo

• U.S. Bank

• Truist

• Understanding underwriting guidelines and approval data points

• Advising on credit profile positioning (utilization, inquiries, age, etc.)

• Managing reconsideration calls if needed

• Processing personal funding applications (personal loans, credit cards, etc.)

• Tracking approvals, limits, and optimizing stacking sequence

• Communicating professionally with clients







Required Experience



You MUST have:



Proven experience funding U.S. business owners

 Experience with 0% interest credit card stacking

Knowledge of high-limit approval strategies

Understanding of credit profile optimization

Experience handling reconsideration calls

Familiarity with lender underwriting data points

Experience processing personal loans & personal credit cards

Strong understanding of credit utilization, inquiries, tradelines, and FICO impact



If you have never funded clients before — do NOT apply.



What We’re Looking For



We want someone who:



• Thinks strategically

• Knows how to maximize approvals

• Understands lender psychology

• Can identify weak profiles before submission

• Knows which banks pull which bureaus

• Understands timing between applications

• Knows how to avoid triggering fraud flags



This role requires deep knowledge — not just admin support.

Commission on every call that leads to a close

Base pay offered after probation

Light, low-stress workload (2–3 hours/day, 7 days/week)

CRM, dialer, and training fully provided

Scripts and SOPs so you never have to "wing it"



What You’ll Be Doing:

Following our proven script to pre-qualify prospects and book appointments

Tracking your calls and appointments inside our CRM

Showing up daily, staying consistent, and booking quality calls

This Role Is NOT for You If:

Who are you and what’s your background?

—Pranav

Acquisition Ascension

- Enjoys working with Excel and data

- Can follow SOPs precisely



Wants stable, long-term remote work



???? Main Responsibilities

1?? Data Entry & Research Support



- Enter product research data into our FastAI Excel model (really simple)

- Structure supplier data clearly and accurately

- Process pricing, margins, competitor data, and logistics information

- Maintain organized documentation

- Accuracy is extremely important in this role.



2?? Product Launch Support



- Set up basic 
 listings (based on templates we provide)

- Format product descriptions according to our structure

- Prepare USP + benefits formatting

- Prepare packaging content documents (we provide exact structure)

- Help coordinate design requirements



3?? Documentation & Logistics Support



- Fill in commercial invoices correctly for Import4You

- Ensure documentation is complete before submission

- Double-check compliance requirements



? Workload & Budget



- Hourly rate: $5 per hour, up to $500 per month

- Workload fluctuates (some weeks busier than others)

- Long-term collaboration preferred

- We care about output and reliability, not clock-watching.





???? What We’re Looking For



You are:



- Extremely detail-oriented

- Experience with 
 + research tools such as Rylee

- Structured and organized

- Fluent in written English

- Experienced with Excel (intermediate level minimum)

- Comfortable following SOPs

- Proactive and communicative

- Available for long-term cooperation

- Experience with e-commerce

- Experience with Shopify

- Experience working with European companies



???? Growth Opportunity



If you perform well, this role can grow into:

- Full project coordination

- Supplier communication handling

- Launch coordination management

- We are building a serious long-term operation.

title: Technical Project Manager
description:
About the Role:

We are seeking a Technical Project Manager to join our Professional Services team. In this role, you will lead customer implementation projects, drive operational coordination, and ensure structured delivery across engagements. You’ll collaborate with cross-functional teams to improve consistency, scalability, and reporting visibility, while keeping customer success at the center of everything you do.



What You’ll Do

•?  ?Support SOW creation and ensure alignment with customer requirements.

•?  ?Provide accurate reporting and operational visibility to leadership.

•?  ?Mentor team members and proactively address delivery challenges.

 and

mbers

title: Telesales VA | £4–£7/hour | UK Hours
description:
Hi there. I'm looking for a confident telesales VA to handle warm leads and turn enquiries into booked vehicle viewings. This is a phone-first role, clear English, calm handling, and solid follow-up matter.



Details:

– £4–£7/hour

– Full-time

– UK hours

– Comfortable with evenings/weekends when needed

– Remote



What You’ll Do:

– Answer inbound calls and return missed enquiries

– Follow up warm leads and confirm viewing bookings

– Share basic vehicle info (mileage, service, specs) using provided details

– Handle questions and objections calmly

– Keep CRM/spreadsheets updated so bookings don’t slip



Good Fit If You:

– Speak clear English with a neutral accent suitable for UK customers

– Are comfortable on the phone and with high call volume

– Can convert warm enquiries into booked appointments

– Stay organised with notes, statuses, and follow-ups

– Are proactive, reliable, and target-driven



To Apply:

Send me a short message and include the words PLANET and NEUTRAL ACCENT in the title.

title: B2B Cold-Calling Specialist | Up to $2,100 per month (On-Target Earnings)
description:
I’m looking for an experienced B2B Cold Calling Specialist who knows how to handle high-volume outbound calls and consistently book qualified meetings.



This is not an entry-level role, and that’s exactly why it pays well.



You’ll earn $10 per hour full-time, plus $25 for every qualified lead meeting you book. Strong performers can reach up to $2,100 per month in on-target earnings.



If you’re confident on the phone, comfortable handling objections, and motivated by performance-based income, this role rewards you directly for results.



Your experience matters here, and so does your earning potential.



Details:

– Full-time

– US business hours

– Remote



What You’ll Do:

– Make outbound cold calls using a dialer

– Follow scripts, handle objections, keep conversations natural

– Qualify leads and book meetings

– Update CRM notes and call outcomes



Good Fit If You:

– Have 2 years of solid B2B cold-calling experience (required)

– Speak clearly with a neutral to strong US accent

– Can hit daily call and booking targets

– Are reliable and metrics-driven



Send a message with DIALREADY and your total years of B2B cold-calling experience in the title.

title: Full time Bookkeeper (Australian)
description:
We are seeking a meticulous and highly organized Senior Bookkeeper to join our team. We need someone who are able to  resolve any financial concerns.



Must-Haves:

Proven experience managing Australian clients for more than 3 years.

Solid understanding of Australian compliance, GST, and payroll regulations.



Please submit y a link to your most updated CV/Resume.

title: Full-Stack Engineer (Next.js + Strapi)
description:
Full-Stack Engineer (Next.js + Strapi)



Product: 
 + Internal Talent CRM

Location: Remote

Compensation: Starting at $5,000/month (flexible based on experience)



?



About the Company




 is a digital talent scouting platform that connects aspiring models with agencies and industry scouts worldwide. The business relies on a public-facing submission platform and a private CRM used to review applications, manage talent profiles, track outreach, and support placements.



We’re looking for an engineer who can help strengthen and scale both systems.



?



The Role



You will own development across:

 1. Public Platform (
)

 • Model profile submissions

 • Media uploads

 • Application workflows

 • SEO-friendly content pages

 • Performance and scalability

 2. Internal CRM

 • Talent pipeline management

 • Review and scoring workflows

 • Agency matching and tracking

 • Role-based access controls

 • Admin dashboards and reporting



This is a high-ownership role. You will work directly with stakeholders to ship production-ready features quickly and cleanly.



?



Tech Stack

 • Frontend: Next.js (SSR, SSG, API routes)

 • Backend: Strapi (custom controllers, permissions, content modeling)

 • Database: PostgreSQL (preferred)

 • Hosting: Vercel / AWS (or similar)

 • Integrations: Payments,
 automation, file storage



?



What You’ll Be Responsible For

 • Designing clean content models in Strapi

 • Building secure APIs for application and CRM workflows

 • Implementing role-based permissions for internal users

 • Optimizing media handling (photo uploads, compression, storage)

 • Improving performance and SEO

 • Maintaining scalable architecture as submissions grow

 • Refactoring legacy code when needed



?



What We’re Looking For



Required

 • 3+ years experience with Next.js

 • Strong hands-on experience with Strapi (customization beyond basic CMS use)

 • Solid Node.js and REST API design experience

 • Experience building internal tools or CRMs

 • Database schema design experience

 • Strong understanding of authentication and access control

 • Ability to own features end-to-end



Nice to Have

 • Experience building marketplace platforms

 • Experience handling media-heavy platforms

 • Knowledge of SEO and SSR performance tuning

 • DevOps and CI/CD familiarity



?



Ideal Candidate

 • Thinks like a product owner, not just a coder

 • Comfortable working independently

 • Writes clean, maintainable code

 • Understands business workflows, not just technical tasks

 • Can improve architecture, not just execute tickets



?



Why This Role

 • Direct impact on a revenue-generating platform

 • Ownership across both customer-facing and internal systems

 • Opportunity to architect a scalable CRM from the ground up

 • Competitive compensation with growth potential

title: AUSTRALIAN BOOKKEEPER
description:
Looking for experienced Australian Senior Bookkeeper who manage complex financial records, ensuring compliance with Australian tax laws and regulations. 



(Must-Haves) Requirements:

Xero Expert

Solid understanding of Australian taxation and compliance requirements

Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field

Ability to meet high-pressure deadlines, and maintain correctness without continual supervision







Submit your application message with a link to your most recent CV/Resume.





Important Note:

Seeking a committed professional for a long-term engagement.  Applications that do not follow instructions will not be reviewed.

title: Technical Implementation Specialist (WordPress, GoHighLevel, n8n, AI Workflows)
description:
We’re a growing SaaS company building Autopilot CRM for home service businesses.

Our customers get a WordPress website + CRM + automations, and we’re looking for a Technical Implementation Specialist who can build, configure, and connect systems — not just install plugins.



This role is for someone who likes systems, logic, workflows, and clean setups.



What You’ll Be Doing



Duplicate and configure WordPress websites from a proven template



Install and configure WordPress plugins (forms, SEO, caching, etc.)



Set up and customize GoHighLevel



Pipelines



Workflows



Triggers



Forms



SMS/email automation



Build and maintain automation workflows using n8n



Assist with AI-powered workflows (logic, routing, triggers — not model training)



Connect WordPress ? CRM ? automations



Assist with A2P registration steps using SOPs



Follow a detailed implementation checklist



Watch training videos and learn Autopilot CRM (no prior knowledge required)



You build and implement — customer communication is handled by our CSM.



Required Skills (Non-Negotiable)



Strong WordPress experience



Themes, plugins, forms, basic troubleshooting



Hands-on GoHighLevel experience



Pipelines, workflows, automations



Experience building workflows in n8n



Comfortable working with logic-based automations



Able to follow SOPs and checklists precisely



Detail-oriented and consistent



Required Mindset



You think in systems, not one-off fixes



You like repeatable processes



You don’t guess — you follow the checklist



You finish what you start



Nice-to-Have (Not Required)



Zapier or Make experience



Twilio / SMS setup experience



Basic API / webhook familiarity



AI workflow experience (routing, summarization, triggers)



SaaS onboarding or implementation background



What You Do Not Need



No software engineering degree



No front-end design perfection



No customer support or sales work



Clean, functional, and working > pretty.



Work Details



Full-time (40 hours/week)



Long-term role (we don’t churn tea
mbers)



Clear SOPs, Loom videos, and structured onboarding



Output-focused, not hours-focused



How to Apply (IMPORTANT)



Start your application with this exact line:



“I build automation systems, not just websites.”



Then answer:



How many WordPress sites have you set up or customized?



Describe your GoHighLevel experience (specific examples).



Describe an n8n workflow you’ve built (what it did and why).



Have you worked with AI-powered automations before? If yes, explain.



Are you comfortable learning a new CRM through training videos and SOPs?



Applications that don’t follow instructions will be ignored.



Why This Role Is Solid



Clear scope and expectations



No customer chaos



No micromanagement



Real systems, real scale



You build — others sell and support

title: Customer Success Manager (SaaS)
description:
About the Company



Autopilot is a fast-growing B2B SaaS platform built for home service businesses (junk removal, cleaning, landscaping, etc.). We replace expensive, complicated software with a simple all-in-one system for scheduling, invoicing, calls, texts, and marketing.



Our customers are real business owners, not tech people — which means great support and follow-up matters a LOT.



Schedule (Important – Please Read Carefully)

This role starts part-time and covers off-hours support for our U.S. customers.

Saturdays & Sundays (required, even if promoted to full-time)

Some weekday night shifts in U.S. Pacific Time (PST)



Schedule will be set in advance and remain consistent

These shifts take place overnight in Manila time



If things go well after the first month, this role can be expanded into a full-time position.



*** What You’ll Be Doing ***

Customer Support (Intercom)

Respond to customer messages using Intercom



Help customers with:

App setup & onboarding

Scheduling jobs, invoices, estimates

Built-in phone system (calls, texts, voi
)

Marketing tools (follow-ups, text blasts)

Troubleshoot issues and escalate only when necessary

Customer Follow-Ups (Very Important)



Proactively follow up with:

Trial users

New customers in their first 30 days

Customers who seem stuck or inactive



Make sure customers actually use the features that make them money



Customer Calls



Call customers when needed to:



Walk them through setup



Solve problems faster than chat



Prevent cancellations



Clear, neutral English accent required



Onboarding & Success



Help customers get their first win inside the app



Reduce confusion and overwhelm



Make customers feel supported, not rushed



Retention & Feedback



Help prevent churn by solving problems early



Clearly document cancellation reasons when customers leave



Share feedback and common issues with the team



? Requirements



Strong spoken and written English



Neutral accent (you will be calling U.S. customers)



Experience with:



SaaS support OR CRM tools



Intercom, Zendesk, or similar chat tools



Confident talking to non-technical customers



Reliable internet, headset, and quiet workspace



Comfortable working weekends & night shifts



? Bonus Points (Not Required)



Experience supporting:



CRM, FSM, or business software



U.S.-based customers



Sales or retention experience



Ability to spot problems and suggest improvements



???? Growth Opportunity



This role starts part-time, but if you’re good:



You can move into a full-time Customer Success role



Take on more responsibility



Grow with a fast-moving startup



We care more about competence and attitude than fancy resumes.



???? How to Apply



Please include:



A short intro about your SaaS support experience



Your availability (nights + weekends)



A short voice recording (1–2 minutes) introducing yourself



Any experience with Intercom or customer calls



Applications without a voice recording will not be considered.

title: Senior React Native Mobile Engineer (7+ Years Experience Required)
description:
???? TL;DR:



If you have only React experience and think React Native is "close enough," it’s not. Don’t apply.

If you don’t own a MacBook Pro with Xcode installed, don’t apply.

If you’ve never submitted a build to App Store Connect or Google Play Console yourself, don’t apply.



We’re only looking for true senior mobile engineers who’ve been through the entire mobile deployment lifecycle more times than they can count.



? What You MUST Bring to the Table:



7+ years building production React Native apps (not React, not hybrid, not Cordova)



Deep familiarity with Expo (managed + bare workflow), and Expo EAS build/deploy pipelines



Expert with both Xcode and Android Studio



Proficient writing native modules (Swift/Obj-C, Kotlin/Java) when React Native hits a wall



Fully understand the iOS mobile ecosystem:



Apple Developer Account setup



Certificates, provisioning profiles, entitlements



Uploading and managing builds in App Store Connect



Internal and external beta testing via TestFlight



App Store metadata and review process troubleshooting



Fully understand the Android ecosystem:



Google Play Console account setup



Creating signing keys and managing build variants



Managing tracks (internal, closed, open, production)



Uploading AABs, rollout strategies, Play Store policies



Strong JavaScript and TypeScript fundamentals (async flow, memory management, perf optimization)



Experience solving hard mobile problems like:



Background tasks



Push notifications (device-specific bugs? Welcome to hell)



Offline caching and syncing



Native SDK integration



UI jank / frame drops



Comfortable managing OTA updates, crash reports, CI/CD workflows, and OTA rollback strategies



???? Bonus Points For:



Having war stories about apps failing App Store review because of a missing privacy string



Working around Expo limitations with custom native code



Knowing what the React Native bridge is and how it becomes a bottleneck



Handling push notification weirdness across Samsung and Huawei devices



Building your own UI library instead of relying on bloated third-party components



Deploying production apps to millions of users across both platforms



???? Minimum Equipment Requirement:



You must own a MacBook Pro with Xcode installed and working



You should be able to build and archive an iOS app locally without Googling “how to do it”



???? How to Apply:



Reply with the following, or you won’t be considered:



How many years of React Native experience you have



Confirm that you are a Senior React Native engineer



Include a portfolio or GitHub link if available

title: Kajabi Website Designer (Drag-and-Drop Specialist, Brand-Focused)
description:
I’m looking for a skilled website designer to style and visually optimise three existing websites built on Kajabi.



The copy and structure are already complete. Your role will be to improve the visual presentation, layout, flow, and overall user experience using Kajabi’s drag-and-drop builder (or similar experience on comparable platforms).



This is not a “build from scratch” role — it’s about elevating what’s already there so it looks premium, on-brand, and conversion-focused.



What I need help with:



Styling 3 Kajabi websites using the existing content



Improving layout, spacing, and visual hierarchy



Making pages feel premium and professional



Ensuring everything stays aligned with brand guidelines



Suggesting small UX improvements where relevant



Working efficiently inside drag-and-drop builders



Ideal experience:



Experience with Kajabi (preferred but not essential)



Strong experience with drag-and-drop site builders (Webflow, Squarespace, Leadpages, etc.)



Good eye for design and brand consistency



Able to take direction but also suggest improvements



Fast, reliable communicator



Important:

Please include:



Examples of websites you have styled (Kajabi preferred)



Your hourly rate



Estimated time to style one full website



Confirmation you are comfortable working within existing brand guidelines



Future opportunity:

If this project goes well, there will likely be ongoing work.

I’m looking for someone who can become my go-to designer for future websites, landing pages, and updates.



Start your application with the word “Designer” so I know you’ve read this properly.
